PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Corin is excellent at her work, but why does she lack confidence in herself...?
If only I could share half of my confidence with her!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Some people are just introverted and sensitive. Fortunately, Corin's companions have complete faith in her capabilities.
Belle, let's encourage her whenever we have the opportunity.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile:
Ellen, with a good aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: The remaining information about Ellen is currently archived in a certain school in New Eridu.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Corin is one of the maids working for Victoria Housekeeping Co.
She is a highly obedient maid but lacks confidence and often fears being disliked by others. When in a rush, she becomes flustered and stutters.
Corin is always apologizing no matter what happens.
"I... I... I'm so sorry! I'm so incompetent... I'll never get things right..."

Corin never, however, fails to fulfill her tasks with excellence and is one of the most reliable members of Victoria Housekeeping Co.
Despite her flawless performance, Corin remains skeptical about her abilities, constantly worrying about being a burden to her colleagues, which can sometimes frustrate Lycaon.
Thoughts: Is Corin's personality innate, shaped by her life experiences?

TrustLv.3: Corin's health record reveals that before joining Victoria Housekeeping, she faced a critical illness and underwent major surgery.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Wipeout
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button during the 3rd and 5th hits to extend the chainsaw slash attack.

Description.Name: Dodge: Shoo!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Oopsy-Daisy!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw attack's duration.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Nope!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Clean Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a series of slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Skirt Alert
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a series of powerful slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack at the cost of Energy if the attack connects.
Character is invulnerable during the spinning slash.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the extended slash, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Sorry...
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Very, Very Sorry!
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Emergency Measures
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: P—Please Allow Me!
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Quick Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes against enemies in front followed by an explosive chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Hyperfocus
Additional Ability: Cleanup Assistance
Desc: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>18.7%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

Additional Ability: Cleanup Assistance

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:

1.Name: Open Trauma
1.Desc: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, her DMG against the target increases by 12% for 15s.
1.Desc2:
"The young mistress always said, if something's worth doing, it's worth focusing on."
"I've been practicing, and I can do it now!"
"But... are you watching me...?"

2.Name: Atomic Smash
2.Desc: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color> is reduced by 0.5%, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
2.Desc2:
"Sorry, Mr. or Ms. Ethereal!"
"But I've got work to do... I really am sorry!"
Feeling guilty, Corin sincerely apologizes to the monster — as she wields her savage chainsaw, slicing through the enemies in her way.

3.Name: Amateur Maid
3.Desc2: "I—I'll do my best to become a good maid!" Corin said, walking towards the Ethereals, chainsaw in hand.

4.Name: Battlefield Retainer
4.Desc: When Corin uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, she recovers 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 16s.
4.Desc2:
A diligent and serious young maid, Corin always puts her heart and soul into everything she does.
Of course, that includes taking out enemies in combat.

5.Name: Special Ops Maid
5.Desc2:
"Uh... sorry, I'm so clumsy. I don't know how to make sure my cuts are even..."
—Said Corin as she looked down at the bits of Ethereal scattered across the ground.

6.Name: Accumulated Release
6.Desc:
When Corin's extended slash hits an enemy, she obtains a stack of Charge (max 40 stacks).
During a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, when her chainsaw detonation hits an enemy, consumes all stacks of Charge. Each stack consumed causes the attack to deal an additional 3% of ATK as DMG.
6.Desc2:
Corin knows that she isn't the most powerful of maids, nor the smartest. But she hopes to become the hardest working.
She puts to good use everything she's ever learned.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Why does Fairy only warn us once when it comes to Qingyi? She warned us to "remember our true identity" three whole times when she gave suggestions about Zhu Yuan!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Because even if she knew, she'd pretend she didn't...
She might even have already guessed.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
Hollow Investigative Association Licensing Archive:
Public Security Officer: Qingyi. Ether aptitude confidential. Licensed for investigation, exploration, and other basic work in known Hollows (including Companion Hollows) in the city.
Note: Qingyi's file belongs to the New Eridu Public Security Janus Quarter Metropolitan Order Department Criminal Investigation Special Response Team. The relevant information can be obtained within the Public Security system, requiring special access permissions.
Further Note: As an intelligent construct, Qingyi demonstrates exceptional Ether aptitude.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Qingyi is a rookie officer in the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team.
As an artificial human, her personality is derived from ancient cultural texts from the old civilization. Her body, known as an "Automaton," is an intelligent construct composed of biological materials.
Recommended by White Star Institute, she was assigned to Public Security as a rookie officer partnered with Zhu Yuan.

Qingyi always exhibits an easygoing, laid-back demeanor, not restricted by rules.
In contrast to modern individuals affected by today's society, Qingyi frequently proposes unexpected solutions to problems.

Qingyi always carries a cup of hot water and takes occasional sips.
"Drinking hot water is good for your health."
Suggestion: Approaching Qingyi is also an ill-considered decision that may compromise your cover. Please remember your true identity as a Proxy.

TrustLv.3:
Qingyi's full name is officially designated as "01 Neo-Genesis VI."
This code is marked on a specific location of Qingyi's body, abbreviated as "01NG Ⅵ."
The researcher from White Star Institute who discovered her thought her code name looked like QING YI, so that's what he called her — Qingyi.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Penultimate
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to four strikes forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During the 3rd-hit, repeatedly press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to continue the attack, continuously striking the enemy. Using <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</color> during this period will not interrupt Qingyi's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> combo count.
During the 3rd hit, stop pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to interrupt the continuous attack, transitioning automatically to the 4th hit. If the continuous attack lasts for a certain time, the 4th hit will be enhanced.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased and DMG received is reduced by 40% during the 3rd and 4th hit.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enchanted Blossoms
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launches a forward rush attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Flash Connect
Description.Desc: When Qingyi deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> with a skill, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color>. When <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> reaches 75%, she will enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state. When using her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, Qingyi will consume all <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> and exit the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state. For every 1% of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> consumed over 75%, her Damage and Daze inflicted by this skill will be increased by 1%/0.5%. <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color> itself does not accumulate <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms
Description.Desc:
During the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch five consecutive forward rush attacks, then execute a Finishing Move that inflicts massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>. Release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the move to trigger the Finishing Move early.
Activate the Finishing Move just before the character is attacked to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased and DMG received is reduced by 40% during the rush attack. Qingyi is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.

Description.Name: Dodge: Swan Song
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Breach
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Rush forward and then launch an upward attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Lingering Sentiments
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Leap into the air and then perform a downward attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Sunlit Glory
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly swings upward, followed by a downward smash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Moonlit Begonia
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Quickly swings upward and leaps into the air, turning around to launch a series of attacks, then follows up with a powerful downward smash, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to consume additional energy to increase the number of hits of the series of attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd-hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Tranquil Serenade
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>
When this attack hits an enemy, the skill's DMG increases by 3% for every stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> in <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Eternal Seasons</color> the target has.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Eight Sounds of Ganzhou
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Wind Through the Pines
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Leap into the air and perform a downward attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Graceful Embellishment
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Song of the Clear River
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Rush forward with an attack and inject electrical energy into the ground, then pull back to trigger an explosion, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Wind Through the Pines
Assist Follow-Up: Song of the Clear River

Name: Core Passive: Eternal Seasons
Additional Ability: Three Verses of Farewell at Yang Pass
Desc: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, it applies 5 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>2</color>%. For each rush attack performed during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the Finishing Move will apply 1 extra stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color>. If <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered when using the Finishing Move, it directly applies {CAL:5+5,1,2} stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color>. When applying Subjugation to normal and elite enemies, the target receives double the stacks. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> are reset.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> deal 20% increased Daze. If Qingyi's Impact is greater than 120, each point over increases her ATK by 6, up to a maximum of 600.

1.Name: Insulation Breakdown
1.Desc: When Qingyi enters combat, <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is instantly restored to its maximum, and the accumulation rate is increased by 30%. When using her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, if <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is at its maximum, the attack will reduce the DEF of the enemy it hits by 15%, and Qingyi's CRIT Rate against that enemy will increase by 20% for 15s.
1.Desc2:
"While there will be no threat to your life, we kindly request you do not resist arrest..."
The direction and intensity of the current have been precisely calculated to ensure that every suspect receives a safe electric shock experience.

2.Name: Minimal Effort, Maximum Impact
2.Desc: The Stun DMG Multiplier increase provided by each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> in <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Eternal Seasons</color> increases to 135% of its original value. When Qingyi's attack hits an enemy and the stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> she applies reaches its maximum stacks, her Daze dealt to the target increases by 15%.
2.Desc2:
An ancient combat technique mentioned in old civillization texts. It seems to have started as a martial arts technique, rather than a staff technique.
"Don't be so constrained, the arm itself can be used like a three-section staff, mhm."

3.Name: Drink Hot Water
3.Desc2:
"Young people should be mindful their health, and drinking more hot water is a good start."
Qingyi always appears comforted when she drinks from her flask. But be careful if she offers you a drink—
"Even 100-degree Celsius boiling water doesn't faze her..." One Public Security Officer who encountered this left such a note.

4.Name: Stable Arc Barrier
4.Desc: Upon entering or exiting <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state, gain a shield equal to 10% of Qingyi's Max HP. If a previous shield is still active when the shield effect refreshes, Qingyi generates 5 Energy. This Energy Generation effect can be triggered once every 10s.
4.Desc2:
By reverse-engineering Automatons from the old civilization, the White Star Institute developed the Arc Barrier, a technology that combines defense, attack, and electrical energy conversion.
"As the saying goes: Water can float a boat or sink it. Physics has a saying: Electric current flows like water. Therefore: Electric current can be used both offensively and defensively. It's a fantastic combination."

5.Name: Youthful Spirit
5.Desc2:
"Great, young people should be courageous and try new things. Keep it up!"
It sometimes feels like Qingyi's encouragement is lazy and teasing, but if you really get into trouble, just rely on her.
After all, she's been around for centuries and can handle anything.

6.Name: Eight Meridians
6.Desc: The Interrupt Level of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color> is greatly increased, and the CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 100%. When Qingyi hits an enemy with her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the target's Attribute DMG RES is reduced by 20% for 15s.
6.Desc2:
A theory about the human circulatory system documented in ancient texts from the old civilization. It's said those who fully master this theory can instantly disable an opponent in a fight.
"How about trying the pressure points that cause itching next time? Who should be the guinea pig? Manager? Or Zhu Yuan?"

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Fairy, you don't have to reiterate anything. We've all come to terms with Jane's name being Jane.
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: I mean, it's far from the worst name we've seen...
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
Hollow Investigation Association Licensing Archive—
Public Security Officer: Zhu Yuan. Ether aptitude confidential. Licensed for investigation, exploration, and other basic work in known Hollows (including Companion Hollows) in the city.
Note: Zhu Yuan's file belongs to the New Eridu Public Security Janus Quarter Metropolitan Order Department Criminal Investigation Special Response Team. The relevant information can be obtained within the Public Security system, requiring special access permissions.
Further Note: Zhu Yuan has excellent Ether aptitude.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Jane, a criminal behavior specialist, has had a "colorful" career as a consultant with Public Security over the years.
She is an expert in disguise, infiltration, and other investigative work.
She has a bad habit of trolling others and sometimes plays harmless pranks.
She's a skilled mimic, able to change her appearance and demeanor at will, making people wonder what the "real" Jane is like.

Jane has a wealth of life experience and can seamlessly blend into any environment, as though she has dabbled in everything there is to do.
However, if you ask her for any further details, she'll give you a different story every time.
Who knows which, if any, are true.

Note 1: Jane does not know our true identity. Do not reveal this to her under any circumstances.
Note 2: Despite "Jane Doe" being an obvious alias, we haven't found any information about her real or former name.
This is not my problem. My guess is that her true identity has been completely erased due to her special status.
Let me reiterate: This is not my problem.
UnlockCondition: Complete the Special Episode "Undercover R&B" and read Jane's DM

TrustLv.1:
Jane, a criminal behavior specialist, has had a "colorful" career as a consultant with Public Security over the years.
She is an expert in disguise, infiltration, and other investigative work.
She has a bad habit of trolling others and sometimes plays harmless pranks.
She's a skilled mimic, able to change her appearance and demeanor at will, making people wonder what the "real" Jane is like.

Jane has a wealth of life experience and can seamlessly blend into any environment, as though she has dabbled in everything there is to do.
However, if you ask her for any further details, she'll give you a different story every time.
Who knows which, if any, are true.

Note 1: Jane does not know our true identity. Do not reveal this to her under any circumstances.
Note 2: Despite "Jane Doe" being an obvious alias, we haven't found any information about her real or former name.
This is not my problem. My guess is that her true identity has been completely erased due to her special status.
Let me reiterate: This is not my problem.
TrustLv.3:
Jane is a total night owl. She loves working the night shift and is most alive after dark.
She's also a bit of a hoarder, constantly filling her home with stuff (usually a bunch of junk food).

The pouch at her waist might look like a makeup bag, but it's actually her toolkit, packed with all the "essentials" for her work.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Dancing Blades
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 6 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Passion
Description.Desc:
When Jane triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or performs a move that deals DMG to the enemy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Upon reaching the maximum <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>, Jane enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> is increased by 25%. Additionally, if Jane's Anomaly Proficiency exceeds 120, each extra point raises her ATK by 2, up to a maximum of 600.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's skills that deal damage consume <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> regenerates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Jane exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state when all of her <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color> is consumed.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Salchow Jump
Description.Desc:
Entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state grants Jane one use of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color>.
When available, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch rapid consecutive attacks forward, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold the button during the consecutive attacks to extend the skill duration. Release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to trigger the Finishing Move early.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the consecutive attacks, and Jane takes 40% reduced DMG. Jane is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.
Using and damaging an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color> while in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state generates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Phantom
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to trigger.
A quick slide dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Jane has an extra dodge. Before she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, she alternates between the two dodges. After entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane can pass through enemies in front when dodging.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Edge Jump
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
If after the first dodge, launch an upward slash in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If after the second dodge, perform a consecutive slashes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Phantom Thrust
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launch three quick rushing slashes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Swift Shadow
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
If after the first dodge, unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If after the second dodge, leap up and deliver three consecutive attacks to enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Swift Shadow Dance
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Aerial Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Leaps into the air to launch consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Leaps into the air to launch multiple consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout
Chain Attack: Flowers of Sin
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Weaves between and slashes enemies in a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Jane directly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Final Curtain
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Weaves between and slashes enemies with a powerful attack in a large area in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Jane directly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Dark Thorn
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Lutz Jump
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, when the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Last Defense
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Gale Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap up and swiftly slash the enemy, then execute a wide sweeping slash across a large area in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Insight
Additional Ability: Sore Spot
Desc: When Jane's attacks hit an enemy, it causes them to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, lasting for 10s. If any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state and causes the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect, the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect duration is extended by 5s, and <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit, with a base CRIT Rate of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> and CRIT DMG of 50%. Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <color=#2BAD00>0.1%</color>.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> is increased by 20%. When the enemy is already suffering from an Attribute Anomaly, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color> towards the target is increased by an additional 15%.

Name: Core Passive: Insight
Additional Ability: Sore Spot
Desc: When Jane's attacks hit an enemy, it causes them to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, lasting for 10s. If any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state and causes the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect, the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect duration is extended by 5s, and <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit, with a base CRIT Rate of <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> and CRIT DMG of 50%. 1.Name: Crime Counsel
1.Desc: The maximum uses of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color> are increased by one. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by an extra 15% and each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency increases her DMG by 0.1%, up to a maximum increase of 30%.
1.Desc2:
"A criminal consultant advises on criminology, not on how to actually commit crimes."
Jane suddenly leaned closer and blinked.
"Of course, if you see it as the latter... I won't mind."

2.Name: Adapt to the Environment
2.Desc: When Jane's attack hits an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, or when any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, 15% of the enemy's DEF is ignored. Additionally, when <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG triggers a critical hit, the CRIT DMG dealt is increased by an additional 50%.
2.Desc2:
Gaze into the abyss, and it gazes back. That's only the first step.
"Then you must approach, enter, and understand it. This is the second step."
"The final step... is to resist becoming it."

3.Name: Anonymity
3.Desc2:
"Anonymity — that means to become anyone. Your favorite person, perhaps~"
"Or maybe, your worst fear?"

4.Name: Adapt and Thrive
4.Desc: When any squad member triggers the <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effects, all squad members' Attribute Anomaly DMG is increased by 18%, lasting 15s.
4.Desc2:
"Whether you're a hunter or the hunted usually depends on your perspective. However, I favor a more straightforward assessment—"
"The Loser is the prey."

5.Name: Compulsive Hoarder
5.Desc2:
Jane's room is filled with all sorts of things, especially fast food.
"Isn't it nice here? There's food within reach everywhere~"

6.Name: "Shady" Technique
6.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's CRIT Rate increases by 20%, and CRIT DMG by 40%. After any squad member inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color>, Jane instantly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. When <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> triggers a critical hit, Jane performs an additional attack on the target, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> equal to 1,600% of her Anomaly Proficiency.
6.Desc2:
On the streets, the means don't matter, only the outcome.
"Seeing the darkest desires reveals the most crucial weaknesses."

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Making Rice Cakes
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Making Rice Cakes (Frosted Banner)
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 faster attacks in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Making Rice Cakes (Frosted Banner)
Dodge: Grab a Bite
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: 50/50
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: 50/50 (Frosted Banner)
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Away From My Snacks
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Away From My Snacks
Special Attack: Cooling Bento
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Soukaku releases a wind current in front of her and unleashes her finishing move, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Holding <IconMap:Icon_Special> while using this skill allows for a quick transition to <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Fanning Mosquitoes
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Releases wind currents of extended range in front of her, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
This skill can be triggered consecutively by pressing repeatedly. Each use consumes a specified amount of Energy. When Soukaku's Energy is depleted, or you stop pressing the button, she unleashes a powerful finishing move that deals massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Holding <IconMap:Icon_Special> while using this skill allows for a quick transition to <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rally!
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Soukaku plunges her weapon into the ground, morphs it into a flag, and launches <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>. Hitting an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color> triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.
Pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or <IconMap:Icon_Special> after <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color> activates a Special Attack as she retracts the flag, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
If Soukaku owns 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> on using <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, she consumes all 3 stacks and enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> state. In the <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> state, she can unleash an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>. This effect can last up to 45s or stack up to 6 times.
Soukaku's weapon gains <color=#FFFFFF>Vortexes</color> in the following circumstances:
Gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> when launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>,
Gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> when launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>,
Gains 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> when launching an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>.
Soukaku can accumulate a maximum of 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color>.

Param.Name: Quick Fly the Flag DMG Multiplier
Quick Fly the Flag Daze Multiplier

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Pudding Slash
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Soukaku quickly unleashes a series of strikes at enemies in front of her and follows up with <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Jumbo Pudding Slash
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Soukaku quickly unleashes an extended series of strikes at enemies in front of her and follows up with <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, Soukaku enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Masked</color> state, increasing her CRIT Rate by 15% for 15s.
Upon activating this skill, other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in gains an additional 20 Energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: A Set for Two
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Guarding Tactics
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Holding <IconMap:Icon_Normal> while using this skill allows for a quick transition to <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: A Set for Two

Name: Core Passive: Blade Banner
Additional Ability: Group Set Meal

This buff can be passed along to characters switching in via <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assists</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> triggered by <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, and it refreshes the duration of the buff.

When Soukaku consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, the <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> of all squad members is increased by 20% for 22s.

1.Name: Uplifting Current
1.Desc: When Soukaku triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Blade Banner</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability: Group Set Meal</color>, the buff duration is increased by 8s.
1.Desc2:
When charged, the special charging module can generate a wind current of Ether energy to charge surrounding Ether devices.
To Soukaku, it's just like having a buffet with friends.
"Guys~ It's all-you-can-eat time!"

2.Name: Experimental Charging Module
2.Desc:
When Soukaku's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, there's a 15% chance she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color>, triggering up to once per second.
When <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> reaches max stacks, any additional stacks grant Soukaku 1.2 Energy instead.
2.Desc2:
A charging module is able to continuously accumulate energy during battle.
Therefore, it is regarded as an era-defining conceptual tactical weapon by the R&D department.
But for Soukaku, fully charging it simply means it's time to eat.

3.Name: Attendance Meal Allowance
3.Desc2: The best way to motivate Soukaku to train harder is simple: just increase her attendance meal allowance.

4.Name: Hypothermia
4.Desc: If an enemy is hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color> is reduced by 10% for 8s.
4.Desc2: The custom-made weapon Oni Banner features a powerful built-in cooling system. Its Ether-infused catalyst generates cold air, dealing significant DMG to enemies it hits.

5.Name: Late-Night Snacks
5.Desc2: To further incentivize Soukaku to train is simple: just add a late-night snack top of the attendance meal allowance.

6.Name: Northern Wind
6.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> state, the number of usable enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> is increased to 12, and also deal 45% more DMG.
6.Desc2: Unlocking the safety device within the blade banner allows it to operate at full capacity. It's not just for combat... it's also handy for cooling down a meal.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Weren't you obsessed with the Starlight Knight series as a kid, Wise?
That brings me back. You shouting "Starlight Mirage!" with your arms crossed...
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
There was never such a time. Please erase such non-existent memories from your mind.
It's been a long time since I was that age, after all, and my name doesn't have "kid" in it.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
Hollow Investigation Association Licensing Archive—
Investigator: Billy. Possesses excellent Ether adaptability and is approved to carry out basic tasks such as extractions within established Hollows (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Ether adaptability for androids depends entirely on their constituent materials. We recommend regular Ether tolerance testing and self-monitoring of component health.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Billy Kid, an AI construct that has passed the forbidden fruit test, is essentially a self-aware machine. 
True to his name, despite having the appearance of a robot, he is quite childlike.
He's a big fan of the visual FX show "Starlight Knight" and wishes to be a hero like the main characters of the show. He often refers to himself as a Starlight Knight and imitates the lines in the show.
Such behavior appears to be only for comedic effect, however.
"Don't make me sound like an idiot! I'm obviously very smart!" — Billy.

TrustLv.1:
Billy Kid, an AI construct that has passed the forbidden fruit test, is essentially a self-aware machine. 
True to his name, despite having the appearance of a robot, he is quite childlike.
He's a big fan of the visual FX show "Starlight Knight" and wishes to be a hero like the main characters of the show. He often refers to himself as a Starlight Knight and imitates the lines in the show.
Such behavior appears to be only for comedic effect, however.
"Don't make me sound like an idiot! I'm obviously very smart!" — Billy.
TrustLv.3:
Similar to Anby, there are gaps in Billy's personal history that remain unfilled. 
The available information indicates that before joining Gentle House, Billy spent an extended period serving with another mysterious gang.
As of now, it appears Billy still maintains a close connection with a certain gang leader from the Outer Ring of New Eridu.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Full Firepower
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes a piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold to enter Crouching Shot to extend the attack duration.
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during Crouching Shot to launch Rolling Shot and adjust the character's position, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Stop pressing or holding during Crouching Shot to launch Finishing Shot at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Starlight Sanction
Description.Desc:
When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Launches a piercing attack at nearby enemies within a large area, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When not dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in a line, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Performs up to 3 piercing attacks in a line, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Clearance Time
Description.Desc:

Launches a powerful piercing attack in a line, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Starlight Mirage

Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

1.Name: Dazzling Entrance
1.Desc: When Billy hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.
1.Desc2:
"You guys are way too honest to be bad guys!"
"All lined up, like NPCs at the shooting range!"

2.Name: Roaming Gunslinger
2.Desc: Billy's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 25%. Rolling Shots during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> count as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during skill activation and able to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodges</color>. When a Rolling Shot triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, it will automatically follow up with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>.
2.Desc2:
"The Starlight Knights never run from danger. That's what we call tactical repositioning for better aim!"
— User "Dreamgirl Monica" from the Starlight Radiance messageboards.

3.Name: Teachings of the Starlight Knights
3.Desc2: Never neglect your training, and never stop improving! This is the philosophy of the Starlight Knights. Billy believes in it wholeheartedly, and practices it sincerely.

4.Name: Starlight Ballistics
4.Desc: When Billy hits an enemy with his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the skill's CRIT Rate increases based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.
4.Desc2:
These explosive bullets of Billy's own invention are incredibly lethal at close range.
Their performance far outstrips Billy's original intention of simply making them cooler.

5.Name: Lost Technological Construct
5.Desc2: Unknown precision components and unique structural design have given Billy performance far beyond his peers... And maintenance costs far beyond his means.

6.Name: Starlight Hero
6.Desc: When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.
6.Desc2:
"Hooboy~ Feelin' great! Move aside, Anby, it's my time to shine!"
"Yo, Anby — can you play the Starlight Knight theme?"
—excerpt from Cunning Hares' "Top 10 Forbidden Sentences," selected by Anby

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Is it just me... or does Grace sound just like a human talking to a cat whenever she's talking to machines?
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
You mean the way you talk to cats, right?
More importantly, is Fairy already thinking about philosophical questions like "Who am I?"
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Grace, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Prolonged exposure to machinery in Ether environments could impact personal health, so please be mindful.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Grace is a technical expert at Belobog Industries. She's the core talent in developing and patenting Belobog's in-Hollow machinery.
She's obsessed with gears, metal and wires — a true mechanical geek. She's eager to dismantle and study any machinery or equipment she takes an interest in: "Such sharp and strong lines, truly beautiful... I can't help but want to open it up and take a look."

Grace always shows extraordinary patience when dealing with machines, doting on the sophisticated metal constructions as if they were her own children.
According to the information at hand, Grace is probably the only one who can playfully refer to Koleda as "Sweet Pea" without receiving a kick in the shin.
Question: Based on Grace's understanding of machines, would she consider me one? I'm currently lacking a physical form, however, so I don't possess components like gears, metal, or wires.

TrustLv.1:

She's obsessed with gears, metal and wires — a true mechanical geek. She's eager to dismantle and study any machinery or equipment she takes an interest in: "Such sharp and strong lines, truly beautiful... I can't help but want to open it up and take a look."

Grace always shows extraordinary patience when dealing with machines, doting on the sophisticated metal constructions as if they were her own children.
According to the information at hand, Grace is probably the only one who can playfully refer to Koleda as "Sweet Pea" without receiving a kick in the shin.
Question: Based on Grace's understanding of machines, would she consider me one? I'm currently lacking a physical form, however, so I don't possess components like gears, metal, or wires.
TrustLv.3: Both of Grace's parents, who were research workers related to the Hollow, disappeared during a dangerous expedition into a Hollow, and were soon presumed dead. Grace was adopted by her parents' former friend, Khors, the previous president of Belobog Industries, and Koleda's father. As a result, Grace and Koleda are "sisters," though not related by blood.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: High-Pressure Spike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
While launching <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to attack while moving. This allows Grace to reposition herself and deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
While Grace is launching <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> combo will not be interrupted by her <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Safety Regulation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Quick Inspection
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slide forward while shooting, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Violation Penalty
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:

Upon use, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Leap in the air and throw two grenades to the front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon use, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal
Chain Attack: Collaborative Construction
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Throws three grenades into the air then strafes to detonate them, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Demolition Blast - Beware
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Throws a custom grenade which explodes in the air and splits into four smaller grenades, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Incident Management
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched in the air, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Unleashes a spinning hail of bullets against enemies in front and throws a grenade, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Pre-Driven Needle
Additional Ability: Tech Support Dept.
Desc: When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>65%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the next <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect inflicted on the target increases <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG by 18%. 1.Name: Recharge Chamber
1.Desc:
When the 4th hit of Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, all squad members gain 0.25 Energy.
Within the same move, this effect can grant a max of 2 Energy to all squad members.
1.Desc2: Efficiency is the lifeblood of engineering, and within Grace's gun barrel resonates its heartbeat.

2.Name: Lightning Piercer
2.Desc: When Grace's thrown grenade hits an enemy during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, lasting for 8s.
2.Desc2:
"Dissecting" complex mechanical structures is Grace's greatest hobby, even in the midst of battle.
How does it feel to get taken apart, with every vulnerability laid bare?

3.Name: Chief Mechanic
3.Desc2:
Grace was personally involved in writing the "Belobog Industries' Construction Safety Guidelines."
She's also the employee who violated the "no dangerous explosives at construction sites" policy the most times.

4.Name: Burst Capacitor
4.Desc: When Grace uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 6 stacks of Charge (max 6 stacks). When her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing her Energy Generation Rate of the attack by 20%.
4.Desc2:
Anton suspected within the component Grace referred to as the "Electropulse Recycling Module," there was, in fact, an Ether hamster tirelessly generating energy around the clock.
"Can you equip my bro with one too?"

5.Name: "Frosty Cold Iron Witch"
5.Desc2: The "Frosty Cold Iron Witch" is capable of taming any mechanical beast, or at least that's what the anonymous fan who came up with the name thinks.

6.Name: Detonation Trigger
6.Desc: When all <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> stacks are consumed to activate a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Grace's skill is enhanced, tossing an extra grenade and increasing each grenade's DMG to 200%.
6.Desc2:
The average blood temperature of Belobog Heavy Industries' employees is ninety-eight degrees Celsius. Grace is often viewed as the safety valve keeping them all from boiling.
When even Grace gives up control, it's a sign for everyone to cover their ears.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Anby often comes to the video store to borrow movies and returns them quickly, so she seems to watch a lot of movies.
Feelin' the pressure, bro? As the manager of the video rental store, it'd be embarrassing if the amount of movies we watch falls behind our customers.
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: Honestly, I'm most curious about Anby's playlist. She's got her headphones on constantly... but what exactly is she listening to?
PartnerInfo.Name: Anby
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
HIA License Archive Information:
Hollow Investigator - Anby. High aptitude for Ether. Permitted to conduct investigations, basic mining, etc. in known Hollows within the city (including companion Hollows).
Reminder: Similar to Nicole, Anby's Investigator license has not been updated for a long time.
Self-funded tests are recommended as soon as possible to avoid any losses.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Anby, the original member of Gentle House.
According to the New Eridu resident records, her identity as "Anby Demara" only exists after joining Gentle House, the name obviously being taken from Nicole. Before registering as an employee of Gentle House, all data relating to Anby is suspiciously blank.
Despite her extreme lack of common sense, Anby is well-versed in matters related to combat and is among the strongest combatants of the Cunning Hares.

Anby's greatest interest is movies, of which she likes an extensive range of genres. Due to an excessive obsession, she tends to take the stories in movies as reality.
Contrary to her seemingly emotionless appearance, Anby is easily moved by movie storylines.
Her favorite food is hamburgers because "they contain protein, carbs, and greens, taste good, and are even affordable — there's nothing else besides hamburgers."

TrustLv.1:
Anby, the original member of Gentle House.
According to the New Eridu resident records, her identity as "Anby Demara" only exists after joining Gentle House, the name obviously being taken from Nicole. Before registering as an employee of Gentle House, all data relating to Anby is suspiciously blank.

Anby's greatest interest is movies, of which she likes an extensive range of genres. Due to an excessive obsession, she tends to take the stories in movies as reality.
Contrary to her seemingly emotionless appearance, Anby is easily moved by movie storylines.
Her favorite food is hamburgers because "they contain protein, carbs, and greens, taste good, and are even affordable — there's nothing else besides hamburgers."
TrustLv.3:
Rumors suggest Nicole found Anby near the ruins of the old capital and took her in because she was impressed by her formidable combat abilities.
"It's not because she's strong! I took her in because I'm kind~" — Nicole
Anby's behavior and combat performance suggest she has had military training.
Due to the suspicious gaps in her history, it's advised to maintain a certain level of vigilance towards her.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Turbo Volt
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes. The first 3 hits deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, the 4th hit deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Thunderbolt
Description.Desc:
After unleashing the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, hold down or pause for a short while, and then press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes a downward strike that deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Taser Blast
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Thunderclap
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Fork Lightning
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes an upward slash that deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd-hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Lightning Bolt
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash that deals massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Electro Engine
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upwards slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Overdrive Engine
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area followed by several downward strikes, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Thunderfall
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Flash
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Lightning Whirl
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Perform a spinning slash against enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
