1.Name: Rapid Charge Mode
1.Desc: When the 4th-hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.
1.Desc2:
"Charge up for just a minute, and you're set to fight for an hour!" That's the sales pitch for these weapon expansion modules.
And they deliver exactly that.

2.Name: Precision Discharge
2.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color> hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.
2.Desc2:
"Electric shocks will knock you out cold."
Looking at the enemy out cold at her feet, she added:
"At least, that's what happens in the movies."

3.Name: Well-Disciplined
3.Desc2: Run, slash, move like lightning. She is no amateur when it comes to Hollows—she's an expert.

4.Name: Conducting Charge
4.Desc:
When Anby launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, off-field Electric Agents recover 3 Energy.
For every 12% Energy Generation Rate Anby has, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6.
4.Desc2: You won't last long fighting solo. An experienced Hollow Raider knows how to create opportunities for their teammates.

5.Name: Street Experience
5.Desc2: Working for the Cunning Hares not only builds your mental toughness but also helps (or rather, forces) you to get in shape.

6.Name: Charging Field
6.Desc: When Anby uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.
6.Desc2:
Coils of electricity flickered over her fingertips.
Anby raised her head, eyes brimming with determination beyond her years.
Perhaps, one day, she will be the one with total mastery over electricity.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Big Daddy looks cultured and sophisticated, but Caesar's a different kettle of fish...
But even though she often gets her idioms wrong, Caesar's still very cute!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Earning the trust of the Outer Ring's Overlord is a pretty big deal. We should really appreciate that.
Of course, it'd be nice if Caesar could make fewer typos in her DMs to us.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
There's no record of Caesar in the New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile.
Based on data analysis from previous combat, Caesar has a good Aptitude for Ether
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Caesar: Leader of the Sons of Calydon biker gang and a "monarch" in the making.
Her combination of formidable strength and bold, straightforward personality has earned her the love and respect of the Outer Ring's residents.
Although she appears to do things in her own way, she is actually very willing to listen to others' opinions. Caesar actively listens to and implements any valid suggestion she hears — regardless of who it comes from.
She is completely defenseless against those she trusts. Once she accepts someone, she considers them part of her inner circle, treating them with absolute trust.
(Assumption: Caesar currently views you in this way.)

Caesar's father has been missing for as long as she can remember, and her mother passed away from illness when she was young. She was raised by Big Daddy, who took a very hands-off approach to raising her, allowing her to grow up freely and independently.

In addition, Caesar seems to have a curious interest in matters related to romance.
If you wish to get closer to her, you might want to try discussing this topic with her.
UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Unexpected New Customers" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 4) to unlock

TrustLv.1:
Caesar: Leader of the Sons of Calydon biker gang and a "monarch" in the making.
Her combination of formidable strength and bold, straightforward personality has earned her the love and respect of the Outer Ring's residents.
Although she appears to do things in her own way, she is actually very willing to listen to others' opinions. Caesar actively listens to and implements any valid suggestion she hears — regardless of who it comes from.
She is completely defenseless against those she trusts. Once she accepts someone, she considers them part of her inner circle, treating them with absolute trust.
(Assumption: Caesar currently views you in this way.)

Caesar's father has been missing for as long as she can remember, and her mother passed away from illness when she was young. She was raised by Big Daddy, who took a very hands-off approach to raising her, allowing her to grow up freely and independently.

In addition, Caesar seems to have a curious interest in matters related to romance.
If you wish to get closer to her, you might want to try discussing this topic with her.
TrustLv.3:
Caesar's father was the leader of a biker gang called "Calydon," which carved out a legendary reputation in the Outer Ring. The "Sons of Calydon" take their name from this legacy.
Caesar has a fear of needles.
"They're so tiny and thin, and it only stings for a second when you're pricked — but then all this blood comes out. It's so weird — and definitely not straightforward at all!"

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Rampaging Slash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 6 slashes ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Dead End
Description.Desc:
When there are sufficient <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Consume 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Point</color> to toss the shield and attack nearby enemies in all directions, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge: Adrift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hog Rush
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Strikes forward with the shield, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
During skill activation, DMG taken is reduced by 40%, and when attacked by an enemy, Caesar blocks with the shield and gets knocked back. Following that, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> and activate <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Eye For an Eye
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Stabs at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Eye For an Eye
Special Attack: Shockwave Shield Bash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Strike forward with the shield, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If Caesar is hit by an enemy at the beginning of the skill's activation, it will trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, negating the damage once and automatically following up with a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color>.
After using the skill, Caesar enters a guard stance, reducing incoming damage by 40%. When attacked by an enemy Caesar blocks with the shield and gets slightly knocked back. Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, activating <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>
When <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> is triggered, Caesar is invulnerable while using the skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Roaring Thrust
Description.Desc:
After activating <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Shockwave Shield Bash</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Thrusts forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> is not triggered, the Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill when <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> is triggered.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Parry Counter
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Strikes forward with the shield, followed by a powerful thrust, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If Caesar is hit by an enemy at the beginning of the skill activation or an <color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</color> is triggered with the shield strike, it will trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, negating incoming damage once and countering with a shield attack. After triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> without consuming energy.
After using the skill, Caesar enters a guard stance, reducing incoming damage by 40%. When attacked by an enemy, Caesar blocks the attack and is knocked back. Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> and activate <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash
Description.Desc:
After activating <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Parry Counter</color>, with enough energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Strikes forward with the shield, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If Caesar is hit by an enemy at the beginning of the skill activation or an <color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</color> is triggered with the shield strike, it will trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, negating incoming damage once and recovering the Energy used to activate the skill.
When the skill is activated through <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, it cannot trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> again.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Stance Switch
Description.Desc: When Caesar triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, her impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:8+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*1,1,2}</color>% for 3s.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash
Chain Attack: Road Rage Slam
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful downward strike at enemies ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Savage Smash
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Tosses the shield forward, unleashing a powerful spinning attack on enemies in front, followed by a downward strike, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When hitting shielded enemies, the Daze dealt is increased by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:40+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*5,1,2}%</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Lane Change
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Stabs at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Aegis Shield
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Aiding Blade
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Tosses the shield forward, unleashing a powerful spinning attack on enemies in front, followed by a slash that deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
After activating the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, activating <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Barrier of Resilience
Additional Ability: Battle Spirit
Desc:
When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Parry Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, or triggers <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> through <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, she buffs all squad members with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield equal to <color=#2BAD00>300%</color> of her base Impact + <color=#2BAD00>200</color>. The shield lasts for 60s and is equipped by the on-field character, with its value shared among all squad members. Any single instance of DMG will not exceed the shield value.
While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's Anti-Interrupt level is increased.
While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's ATK is increased by <color=#2BAD00>40</color>. After <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> expires, this buff remains for an additional 5s.

When another character in your squad can activate <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or shares the same Faction:
When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Dead End</color>, she applies a Debuff effect to enemies within a 7m radius, increasing the damage they take from all squad members by 25% for 30s.

1.Name: Spearhead Advance
1.Desc: When Caesar enters combat or switches in, she instantly buffs all squad members with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield. This effect can trigger once every 300s. While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, enemies within a 5m radius of the shield bearer suffer a 15% All-Attribute RES reduction.
1.Desc2:
"Big Daddy taught me that this is when you form a spearheaded formation with overwhelming force and strike at the enemy's weakest point—"
"And I'll be leading the charge, of course!"

2.Name: Legacy of the Far Lands
2.Desc: While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Barrier of Resilience</color> is active, Caesar's Energy Generation Rate increases by 10%, and the shield bearer's ATK boost is increased to 150% of its original value.
2.Desc2:
Caesar's combat style stands out from those of New Eridu or the Outer Ring, drawing from the techniques of the most skilled warriors among the wanderers.
Knowing when to hold back and when to strike decisively — that has always been the wanderer's way of survival. And Caesar has always been a good student of this philosophy.

3.Name: Absolute Trust
3.Desc2:
Once Caesar recognizes someone as one of her own, she fully accepts them as part of her inner circle. She gives them absolute trust, letting her guard down completely...
Just like she does with you now.

4.Name: Aries the Battering-Ram
4.Desc: When Caesar uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 3 additional <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color>. If her Energy is below 20, she can activate <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Point</color> instead. This substitution can trigger once every 5s.
4.Desc2:
One of the tactics Caesar mastered under the guidance of the wanderers.
"No matter what, I'll fight till the last moment!"

5.Name: Romantic Conquest
5.Desc2:
Behind Caesar's carefree and unpolished appearance lies a romantic at heart.
She's always curious about love stories.
But if you dig a little deeper into the subject... you might just catch her blushing.

6.Name: Overlord's Will
6.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color> are guaranteed to trigger a critical hit. The skill's DMG is increased by 50% and deals additional 50% DMG to the primary target. When Caesar uses <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, her CRIT Rate is increased by 30% and her CRIT DMG is increased by 60% for 15s.
6.Desc2:
"I used to keep my eyes straight ahead, thinking that as long as I was strong enough, I could do anything."
"But being a great leader takes more than just power."
"I need to protect my friends behind me — they are the reason I can keep going."

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Turns out Nicole is more famous in the biz than I thought huh!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: Instead of these astute comments, I'm more interested in seeing a comprehensive list of everything Nicole owes us.
PartnerInfo.Name: Nicole
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
HIA License Archive Information:
Hollow Investigator - Nicole. High aptitude for Ether. Permitted to conduct investigations, basic mining, etc. in known Hollows within the city (including companion Hollows).
Alert: Data shows Nicole's Hollow Investigator license has not been renewed for a long time and is about to expire.
Failure to undergo the relevant tests at one's own expense after the expiry date may result in the license being revoked.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Database search: Nicole. Returned results:
"Boss of the odd-job agency, the Cunning Hares," "Streetwise," "Orphan, parents unknown."
Nicole's agency was originally called Gentle House, but due to her reputation of being cunning, it gained the nickname the Cunning Hares.
"She's really into money! I don't know what she's doing with it all though, seems like she's doing nothing."
— The above is a quote from a popular post on Inter-Knot: "Her odd-job agency is outrageous. I've never encountered a boss who knows how to turn everything into profit!"
The individual involved responded, "This, this is a false accusation! I, Nicole, have never been skilled at making money — mainly because I don't have any money to begin with!"
According to reliable sources, the Cunning Hares are constantly in debt, and their "careful budgeting" seems to have no effect on the organization.

TrustLv.1:
Database search: Nicole. Returned results:
"Boss of the odd-job agency, the Cunning Hares," "Streetwise," "Orphan, parents unknown."
Nicole's agency was originally called Gentle House, but due to her reputation of being cunning, it gained the nickname the Cunning Hares.
"She's really into money! I don't know what she's doing with it all though, seems like she's doing nothing."
— The above is a quote from a popular post on Inter-Knot: "Her odd-job agency is outrageous. I've never encountered a boss who knows how to turn everything into profit!"
The individual involved responded, "This, this is a false accusation! I, Nicole, have never been skilled at making money — mainly because I don't have any money to begin with!"
According to reliable sources, the Cunning Hares are constantly in debt, and their "careful budgeting" seems to have no effect on the organization.
TrustLv.3:
During her early years, Nicole spent a good amount of time in an orphanage.
There are rumors that Nicole once reached an adoption agreement with a prominent family. Yet, shortly afterward, she reappeared by herself somewhere in New Eridu, and has been out around the streets ever since.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cunning Combo
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
Description.Desc: After using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Nicole can reload, and her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> are enhanced, increasing the power of her bullets.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
Dodge: Speed Demon
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to dodge, then hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to reload while dodging, enhancing <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box
Description.Desc:
When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Dashes in the target direction and strikes nearby enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When not dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Vaults backward and launches a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Diverted Bombard
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box
Dash Attack: Do As I Please
Special Attack: Sugarcoated Bullet
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Stuffed Sugarcoated Bullet
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
A powerful ranged strike, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> down to charge up this attack, during which a small energy field is generated at the muzzle as Energy is consumed, dealing bonus DMG to enemies nearby.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Stuffed Sugarcoated Bullet
Chain Attack: Ether Shellacking
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful ranged strike at enemies in a small area, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Ether Grenade
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful ranged strike at enemies in a small area, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
When using this skill, other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in gains an additional 20 Energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Emergency Bombard
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: The Hare Strikes Back!
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Window of Opportunity
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge forward and bombard enemies, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: The Hare Strikes Back!

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case</color> applies a debuff to an enemy, all squad members deal 25% more <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> to the target for 3.5s.

Name: Core Passive: Mechanical Case
Additional Ability: Hare of Many Burrows
Desc: After hitting an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> for 3.5s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case</color> applies a debuff to an enemy, all squad members deal 25% more <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> to the target for 3.5s.

1.Name: Supercharged Bomb
1.Desc: The DMG and the Anomaly Buildup inflicted by Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases by 16%. For each additional 0.1s of charging when Nicole activates her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the duration of the energy field created at the target location increases by 0.15s
1.Desc2:
"I've juiced you all up! Go get 'em!"
"Huh? I-I wasn't slacking off, I swear — I just needed a break!"

2.Name: Charging Device
2.Desc: Nicole recovers 5 Energy when <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case's</color> debuff is triggered. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
2.Desc2:
"Never underestimate the value of a single second!"
"Do you have any idea how much extra I can squeeze out of just one second? It's unfathomable!"
"So, can I get a productivity bonus? How about 10%, huh?"

3.Name: A Hare's Cunning
3.Desc2: Without overpowering might or abundant resources, Nicole depended on her own sharp mind to bring the Cunning Hares to where they are today.

4.Name: Field Expansion
4.Desc: When Nicole uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the diameter of the energy field generated at the target location is increased by 3m.
4.Desc2:
"This, and this too — all of this will soon become the Cunning Hares' territory. Do you hear me!"
"W—What? How soon?"
"Uh... in about ten thousand years, based on current revenue projections."

5.Name: Industry Star
5.Desc2: Though they have plenty of enemies in the industry, Nicole has led her team out of many impossible situations, and so their reputation and experience steadily grew.

6.Name: Corrupting Energy Field
6.Desc: When Nicole's energy fields deal DMG to an enemy, all squad member's CRIT Rate against that enemy increases by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times, and lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
6.Desc2: A switch to higher quality ammo with better firepower and increased compressed Etheric Matter leads to higher damage, longer use duration... and higher costs.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Sometimes Piper says "lil ol' me" instead of "I"... Is she trying to be funny...? Or maybe she's shy!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
I think it's probably just a catchphrase.
By the way, that last part... Is Fairy trying to complain about us...?
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
TLDR: Piper has a good Aptitude for Ether.
Note: I believe, considering Piper's personality, she prefers a simple introduction such as this.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Piper is a truck driver for the Sons of Calydon. Apart from driving, she's also responsible for vehicle maintenance and other related jobs.
Her tiny stature, cute voice (though she always seems half-asleep when not driving), and adorably harmless appearance (though she's a shut-in who can't be bothered to take care of her own appearance) make it hard to imagine that she would have such a crazy driving style.
Usually, by the time she drawls out, "Hold~ on~ tight~," the truck is already barreling down the road.
Rumor has it, Piper is a driver who doesn't need brakes. Though riding with her is a terrifying experience, she will always get you where you need to go safely, and in the shortest time possible. Of course, "safely" doesn't include any trauma that may be induced.

Piper has many hobbies that don't seem to match her age, such as reading newspapers, buying lottery tickets, and collecting car magazines.
Piper's biggest wish is to live each day slowly and leisurely.
Note: Please keep in mind, Master, that this is also my wish.
UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Unexpected New Customers" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 4) to unlock

TrustLv.3:
Piper has a love for the sound of truck engines starting up, so she recorded the sound of Steeltusk starting up. She has to listen to the recording to fully wake up in the morning.
If Piper falls asleep during a meeting, playing a recording of a truck engine can quickly get her wide awake again (this intel was provided by Lucy).

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out
Dodge: Handbrake Drift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Power Drift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Unleash a downward smash attack in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal
Special Attack: Tire Spin
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Piper spins and launches a sweeping slash around her, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to extend the skill duration, unleashing increasingly powerful spinning slashes and increasing the charge level of the skill up to 2 times.
If the skill is used after the first 3 hits of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, you can quickly activate <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> of an increased charge level.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Special Attack: One Trillion Tons
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> is active, release <IconMap:Icon_Special> to trigger a downward smash attack based on the charge level of <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color>, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Engine Spin
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, continue holding <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> after <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> reaches maximum charge level to activate:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes around her and dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
This skill consumes Energy continuously for up to 3s.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Really Heavy
Description.Desc:
During <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, release <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Piper unleashes a downward smash attack, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> reaches its limit or Energy drops to 20, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</color> will automatically activate.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Buckle Up
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful downward smash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Hold~ On~ Tight~
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes at enemies in a large area ahead, followed by a downward smash, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Brake Tap
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Launches a downward smash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Emergency Brake
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Overtaking Maneuver
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Repeated triggers reset the duration. For every stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, Piper's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>2%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Piper has 20 or more stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, all squad members' DMG is increased by 18%.

1.Name: Leisure Moment
1.Desc: When Piper's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>. The maximum stack limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> is increased to 30.
1.Desc2:
One ordinary morning at Sons of Calydon, Piper lets out a lazy yawn.
"Good morning—"
"Can we have another relaxing day today? It's important to take it easy, or else lil ol' me might end up working meself to death—"

2.Name: Motivation
2.Desc: During <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, Piper's movement speed increases. When using <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: One Trillion Tons</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, this buff is further increased by 1%.
2.Desc2:
A bit of effort now means more rest later.
Though, it'd be even better if I didn't have to put in any effort at all — Piper stretches, pats the soft bed in her truck, and lies down.

3.Name: Truck Expert
3.Desc2:
Piper is always all about trucks.
Even when she's fast asleep, the rumble of an engine snaps her awake in an instant:
"100 horsepower, 5-ton capacity... must be the new light truck from Three Gates Industries!"

4.Name: Refined Techniques
4.Desc: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 30s.
4.Desc2:
Riding with Piper is a heart-pounding experience.
By the time she drawls out, "Hold~ on~ tight~," the truck is already barreling down the road.
She always gets you to your destination fast—though your nerves might take a hit.

5.Name: Personal Hobbies
5.Desc2:
Piper seems to have some hobbies that are not what you'd expect from her.
"This horse looks like a real runner... Hmm, but not many people are betting on it. Guess the one with the higher win rate is the safer bet..."
"Burp— Nitro-Fuel... I can drink more... Gimme another one!"

6.Name: Mild Excitement
6.Desc: Increases the duration limit of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> by 2s and extends the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> by 4s.
6.Desc2:
As you may already know, Piper's biggest dream is to live a life of perpetual relaxation.
But right now, her usually half-closed eyes are surprisingly bright and alert.
"If it's for you... I suppose lil ol' me can try a little harder~"

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Kitty cat! Who doesn't like kitty cats!
Ohhh, I want to touch Nekomata's tails! She's got two, that's double the fun!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Take it easy... She's not some harmless little kitten on the street in New Eridu...
When dealing with Nekomata, the most important thing is keeping an eye on your wallet...
PartnerInfo.Name: Nekomata
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator - Nekomata. Excellent aptitude for Ether. Permitted to conduct investigations, basic mining, etc. in known Hollows within the city (including companion Hollows).
Remarks: In general, Thirens are better able to adapt to the environment in the hollows than humans. However, due to their faster metabolism, once corrupted they will experience symptoms at a faster rate than humans. Similarly, their efficiency in recovering from the symptoms when leaving the Hollows is also faster.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Nekomiya Mana. Refers to herself as "Nekomata."
A cat Thiren with feline traits, possessing great dexterity when hunting and an insatiable curiosity about the outside world.
Sometimes mischievous, she engages in harmless pranks. But when she sets her sights on a target, her feline-like agility and focus are enough to leave others in awe.
She's most interested in other people's wallets.
Recommendation: Always keep an eye on your wallet when Nekomata is around.

In the past, Nekomata was a member of the long-standing Red Fang Gang. Its leader, Miguel Silver, took on a fatherly role in her life. Nonetheless, due to differing beliefs from the gang, she opted to part ways and go it alone.
Following certain encounters involving Nicole and others, she eventually opted to enlist in Gentle House, thus becoming the third member of the team.
UnlockCondition: Complete Agent Story "Cat and Mouse Game"

TrustLv.1:

Sometimes mischievous, she engages in harmless pranks. But when she sets her sights on a target, her feline-like agility and focus are enough to leave others in awe.
She's most interested in other people's wallets.

In the past, Nekomata was a member of the long-standing Red Fang Gang. Its leader, Miguel Silver, took on a fatherly role in her life. Nonetheless, due to differing beliefs from the gang, she opted to part ways and go it alone.
Following certain encounters involving Nicole and others, she eventually opted to enlist in Gentle House, thus becoming the third member of the team.
TrustLv.3: Additional Note: Within the Gentle House, Nekomata seems to hold a significant interest in Nicole, much to Anby's displeasure. The likely reason for this could be summed up as: "I was here first..."

1.Name: Bird Hunter
1.Desc: When Nekomata hits an enemy from behind, she ignores 16% of her target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color>. If the enemy is Stunned, all Nekomata's attacks are considered back attacks.
1.Desc2: While Nekomata lacks strength due to her small size, she has the perceptiveness and agility required to locate her enemies' weaknesses and strike right where it hurts most.

2.Name: Cat & Mouse
2.Desc: When there's only one enemy on the field and Nekomata is in combat, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 25%.
2.Desc2:
Cats always prefer to toy with their prey.
If there's only one mouse left in combat — that's Nekomata's play time.

3.Name: Curious Left Tail
3.Desc2:
According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of a cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within...
Even if that's not true, the experience Nekomata has gained on the streets certainly is.

4.Name: Sharpen Claws
4.Desc: When Nekomata uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, her CRIT Rate increases by 7% for 15s, stacking up to 2 times, with each stack's duration being calculated separately.
4.Desc2:
"Gimme more, gimme MORE! I can eat 'em all~"
Her eyes sparkle as she licks the back of her paws.

5.Name: Lucky Right Tail
5.Desc2: According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of a cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within... Sometimes Nekomata wonders to herself: If she is lucky enough to keep surviving, will she eventually grow another tail?

6.Name: Predator Lineage
6.Desc: When Nekomata launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, her CRIT DMG increases by 18%, stacking up to 3 times. The effect expires when she's no longer in-combat. This effect gains maximum stacks immediately on defeating an enemy.
6.Desc2:
"When a feline Thiren gets positive reinforcement from aggressive behavior,
their latent animalistic tendencies emerge.
Fortunately, these tendencies aren't permanent..."
—Excerpt from the Handbook of Incomplete Research on Feline Thirens

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: An exemplary human. We've been dealing with such an opponent for so long. Aren't we amazing?
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: That's because it's me + you + Fairy. I wouldn't wanna know the outcome if it was one on one...
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
Hollow Investigation Association Licensing Archive—
Public Security Officer: Zhu Yuan. Ether aptitude confidential. Licensed for investigation, exploration, and other basic work in known Hollows (including Companion Hollows) in the city.
Note: Zhu Yuan's file belongs to the New Eridu Public Security Janus Quarter Metropolitan Order Department Criminal Investigation Special Response Team. The relevant information can be obtained within the Public Security system, requiring special access permissions.
Further Note: Zhu Yuan has excellent Ether aptitude.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Zhu Yuan, an exceptional officer at Public Security, is a highly skilled individual expected to become the next commissioner. She currently leads the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team at the Janus Precinct within the Metropolitan Order Department. Her team members include Qingyi, Seth, and [redacted].
Note: For documents with higher security levels within the Public Security system, further investigation is required; scheduling priority - low.

Zhu Yuan possesses excellent skills in criminal investigation, combat, and self-management (including working overtime). She has no unresolved cases on record.
Suggestion: Approaching Zhu Yuan is an ill-advised decision that may compromise your cover. Always remember your true identity as a Proxy. Remember your true identity as a Proxy. Remember your true identity as a Proxy.

TrustLv.1:
Zhu Yuan, an exceptional officer at Public Security, is a highly skilled individual expected to become the next commissioner. She currently leads the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team at the Janus Precinct within the Metropolitan Order Department. Her team members include Qingyi, Seth, and [redacted].
Note: For documents with higher security levels within the Public Security system, further investigation is required; scheduling priority - low.

Zhu Yuan possesses excellent skills in criminal investigation, combat, and self-management (including working overtime). She has no unresolved cases on record.
Suggestion: Approaching Zhu Yuan is an ill-advised decision that may compromise your cover. Always remember your true identity as a Proxy. Remember your true identity as a Proxy. Remember your true identity as a Proxy.
TrustLv.3:
She has a tendency to be a perfectionist and exhibits a strong obsession with "neatness" and "perfection," which may be considered her only weakness (?). Officer Qingyi, her mentor in life and subordinate at work, often remarks that Zhu Yuan's perfectionism complex will worsen unless someone can talk her out of it. However, due to her high standards for herself, she has gained ample experience and skills to lead the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team and attract exceptional talents.

Zhu Yuan seems to have a passion for gardening. She is currently growing a tomato plant in her office, which is often pilfered by a raccoon family residing near the Public Security office.
Thoughts: Could this provide a potential avenue for infiltrating Public Security?

Zhu Yuan is a rarity among humans, showing no particular fondness for small furry animals.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Don't Move!
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Assault Mode]</color>
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate.
Unleash a flurry of martial arts, bullets, and Ether Buckshots in a series of up to 5 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
When the 4th or 5th hit strikes an enemy, obtain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> per hit. A max of 1 can be obtained per activation of this Basic Attack.
While using this skill, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive</color> and readjust to face the selected direction.
While under <color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to switch to <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Suppressive Mode]</color>
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleash up to 3 Shotshell piercing attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. If Zhu Yuan has <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> upon firing, 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> will be consumed, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
While using this skill, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to activate her <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> and readjust to face the selected direction.
While in <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to return to <color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist
Dodge: Tactical Detour
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Uses handgun to attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> to activate:
Unleashes a Shotshell piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. If Zhu Yuan has <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> when firing, 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> will be consumed, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Fire Blast
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate.
Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> on skill use.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Buckshot Blast
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Shoots Ether Buckshots that deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>. This can be repeated 3 times by repeatedly pressing <IconMap:Icon_Special>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Full Barrage
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Shoots a series of Ether Buckshots, that explode and deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Eradication Mode
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Max Eradication Mode
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Covering Shot
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> on skill use.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: Guarded Backup
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Defensive Counter
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Attack with a combination of martial arts and shotshells, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Quick Reload
1.Desc: When Zhu Yuan activates <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</color>, gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect. When Zhu Yuan has the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect and uses up all <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect will be consumed to instantly gain 6/9 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
1.Desc2: Zhu Yuan once competed in the Janus Quarter's Public Security Officer Contest, clinching first place with her extraordinary reloading techniques. Her colleague commented: "It's nothing but sheer practice."

2.Name: Ether Ember
2.Desc: In <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, Zhu Yuan's Anti-Interrupt level is increased and DMG taken reduced by 10%. When Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, deal 10% more <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 5s. Each shot adds one stack of this effect, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
2.Desc2:
Zhu Yuan is equipped with Ether bullets specially designed by Public Security, which cause irreversible corruption upon hitting the enemy.
This is why Zhu Yuan always warns her enemies to surrender and stop resisting before she fires. It really is for their own health and safety...

3.Name: Public Security Special Training
3.Desc2: As an elite Public Security Officer, Zhu Yuan's training focused on a single objective: to enhance all aspects of her combat abilities within the Hollow, ensuring she could outmatch any criminal.

4.Name: Ether Perforation
4.Desc: When Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FE437E>Ether RES</color>.
4.Desc2: When in battle, the gangs in the Hollows often try to quietly calculate how many bullets their enemies have left. What they don't know is that Zhu Yuan's custom magazine can recharge itself with the Ether in the air...

5.Name: Special Ops Experience
5.Desc2: A seasoned Public Security Officer excels at reading the battlefield, striking precisely and maximizing combat efficiency. Sometimes, one stern look is enough to make her enemies think twice about putting up a fight.

6.Name: Expanded Energy Pack III
6.Desc: When Zhu Yuan consumes a total of 12 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, she receives the <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> effect, and the Energy cost of the next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is reduced by 30. Launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> and shoot an additional 4-bullet Ether Buckshot. Each extra bullet deals DMG equal to 220% of Zhu Yuan's ATK.
6.Desc2: Zhu Yuan often worries about her gear's remaining battery, getting nervous when the power dips into the red zone and consciously saving power. Public Security finally equipped her with an energy pack that offered both high capacity and long-lasting endurance.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Is there truly anything in this world that poses a challenge for Lycaon?
It seems that no matter what obstacles he encounters, he effortlessly solves them all (as long as you touch his tail)!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Belle, did your comment get mixed up with your personal preferences...?
And Fairy suggested touching Lycaon's chin and head, not his tail.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator: Lycaon, with an excellent aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: Lycaon's personal files contain a classified section that requires administrator permissions to access.
It is assumed this section contains information about his past and criminal records.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Lycaon, the substantive leader and representative of Victoria Housekeeping Co., is responsible for managing all members of the company.
Rational and reliable, Lycaon is an elegant gentleman and a versatile attendant who can solve any problem. He is the cornerstone of his team and a reassuring presence.
He has a slight obsession with cleanliness, always tidying up his surroundings and unable to tolerate dirty environments.

Although Lycaon maintains his elegance and composure, his canine instincts occasionally shine through. When he is particularly happy, his tail and ears unconsciously wag. He seems to be aware of this habit and somewhat bothered by it.
Additionally, like most furry Thiren, Lycaon takes great care of his fur.

Suggestion: Since Lycaon is a canine Thiren, stroking his head or chin may enhance the emotional connection between you. (Note: Success is not guaranteed.)
* Risks: Due to his height, you may not be able to do this even if you stand on tiptoes.
UnlockCondition: Complete Agent Story "And the True Heroes Are Always Behind the Scenes"

TrustLv.1:
Lycaon, the substantive leader and representative of Victoria Housekeeping Co., is responsible for managing all members of the company.
Rational and reliable, Lycaon is an elegant gentleman and a versatile attendant who can solve any problem. He is the cornerstone of his team and a reassuring presence.
He has a slight obsession with cleanliness, always tidying up his surroundings and unable to tolerate dirty environments.

Although Lycaon maintains his elegance and composure, his canine instincts occasionally shine through. When he is particularly happy, his tail and ears unconsciously wag. He seems to be aware of this habit and somewhat bothered by it.
Additionally, like most furry Thiren, Lycaon takes great care of his fur.

Suggestion: Since Lycaon is a canine Thiren, stroking his head or chin may enhance the emotional connection between you. (Note: Success is not guaranteed.)
* Risks: Due to his height, you may not be able to do this even if you stand on tiptoes.
TrustLv.3:
Lycaon has a troubled past that he keeps to himself.
Despite his current elegant and gentle demeanor, the former Lycaon led a wild lifestyle and had a friend whom he trusted implicitly.
However, this friend has now become a bitter enemy.

Note: Due to limited information, it is challenging to uncover the specifics of his past.
You should consider trying to gather information from different angles about the individuals involved to obtain more valuable intelligence.

Desc:
When Lycaon charges his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>80%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

1.Name: Full Moon Momentum
1.Desc: When Lycaon's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, the attack's Daze increases by 12%. This effect can trigger once every 8s. When he charges his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to completion, this buff will increase by an additional 10%.
1.Desc2:
Records suggest that werewolves exposed to moonlight become significantly more aggressive.
"Don't stare directly at the moon."

2.Name: Energy Feedback
2.Desc: When Stunning an enemy or triggering a squad member's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, Lycaon gains 5 Energy. Can trigger once every 1s.
2.Desc2:
"Canines receive a brief dopamine boost in their brains after completing semi-complex tasks. At that moment, if their owner pets them to show encouragement, they will be extremely happy..."
—Excerpt from the "Handbook of Unreliable Canine Research"

3.Name: Attendant Training
3.Desc2: His every gesture exudes poise, and his words and actions are as refreshing as a spring breeze. An attendant's training is about maintaining control over everything.

4.Name: Graceful Demeanor
4.Desc:
If Lycaon is attacked while using a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, he will immediately gain a Shield equal to 7.5% of his Max HP, lasting for 15s.
During the Shield's duration, his Anti-Interrupt level is increased. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
4.Desc2: "An outstanding attendant maintains a graceful demeanor at any and all times."

5.Name: Alpha Nature
5.Desc2: His glance harbors a primal ferocity, and the echoes of his howls rumble within his throat. Regardless of his current gracefulness, underneath the formal wear, he's still untamed.

6.Name: Ruthless Hunter
6.Desc: When a charged attack hits an enemy, the target suffers 10% increased DMG from Lycaon, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 12s. Only one stack can be gained per skill use, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
6.Desc2:
"Apologies, but given the circumstances, I will not show any mercy."
"After all, if a fair fight is what you are after, a Hollow is not the place to look for it."

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Anton keeps saying he's the "second-best driller in the company."
So... who's the first?
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: I think it's the heavy drill machine from their company. I've heard him say something like "I gotta win next time" against it.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Anton, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Besides himself, Anton's bro also possesses relatively good Ether aptitude.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Anton is a key member of construction staff at Belobog Industries and one of Koleda's trusted aides.
"Got a job you can't handle? Leave it to me!"
 Anton is one of the top brass at Belobog, handpicked by its former president Khors, which makes him a "senior employee."
A genuine, straightforward man, always boosting the morale of his coworkers with his surplus of energy.

Apart from this, it seems Anton is always talking to his jackhammer, affectionately calling it, "Bro."
An instance from Anton's everyday life goes like this:
Anton, seemingly in dialogue with himself, asks, "Whaddaya think, Bro?" 
The jackhammer replies, "Vroom vroom vroom—"
Anton, apparently enlightened, responds, "I see, I see! You still got it, Bro!"
Unfortunately, I have not collected enough information on such occurrences and am not able to deliver further analysis.

Apart from this, it seems Anton is always talking to his jackhammer, affectionately calling it, "Bro."

Anton, seemingly in dialogue with himself, asks, "Whaddaya think, Bro?" 
The jackhammer replies, "Vroom vroom vroom—"
Anton, apparently enlightened, responds, "I see, I see! You still got it, Bro!"
Unfortunately, I have not collected enough information on such occurrences and am not able to deliver further analysis.
TrustLv.3:
Here is a video recording depicting Anton's life:
Late at night at the construction site, Anton gazes down at his jackhammer and mutters to himself, "Dang, this is exhausting, Bro..."
As the jackhammer buzzed to life, Anton nodded in acknowledgment. "No, a real one doesn't complain about being tired! Thanks for reminding me, buddy! You can never back down from a challenge!"
The truth is, Anton had set up demanding tasks for the construction workers, hoping to push them to their limits and unlock their true potential. However, witnessing their struggles and diminishing confidence, he couldn't bear to see them suffer any longer, so he secretly completed all the tasks in the dead of night.
In the end, Anton became the one who accepted all the trials.

* Anton's beloved "bro," aka his jackhammer, appears to have a connection to his former colleagues.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 mixed attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
The 4th-hit is a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>.

During the 2nd <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> and 3rd <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to extend the skill duration.

Anton enters <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> after using this skill. When in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, Anton's attacks become more powerful, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> while continually consuming Energy upon hitting an enemy. Burst Mode remains active until his Energy is depleted.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Warm-Up Exercises
1.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy, up to a maximum of 5 Energy per skill use.
1.Desc2:
"Are you awake? Get spinning, bro!"
"Try and keep up. It's time to do our stretches!"

2.Name: State of Flow
2.Desc: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, he gains a Shield that equals to 7.5% of his Max HP. While in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, entering combat or switching in reapplies the Shield effect. This effect can trigger once every 15s. The Shield dissipates when <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> ends.
2.Desc2:
After arduous training, a few lucky individuals will display exceptional vigor and perform above their usual level during high-intensity activities, entering a state of flow commonly known as "being in the zone."
Are you ready to get moving and enter the zone?
— Nitro-Fuel's exclusive program "Good Morning, Zealous Office Workers!"

3.Name: Rotational Training
3.Desc2: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but in a complex and ever-changing Hollow worksite, having a wide skillset can present an opportunity to overcome difficulties.

4.Name: Everyone Get Fired Up!
4.Desc: When Anton uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, all squad members' CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.
4.Desc2:
"Find your rhythm, and let's get moving!"
When Anton starts to get serious, everyone becomes more nimble.
They have to keep up or else they will be training alone the next day.

5.Name: Jack of All Trades
5.Desc2: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but if you are resolute enough to change from "knowing a bit" to "being excellent," then you become omnipotent!

6.Name: Break the Limit
6.Desc: When Anton's <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color> triggers a critical hit, his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)</color> deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
6.Desc2:
"Yeah bro, can you feel the burn?"
Whenever Anton wants to exceed his limits,
his "bro" starts spinning at an astonishing pace, its buzzing echoing Anton's resolution.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Is this all the information we have? Come on, Fairy, can't you do better?
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: Hmm, I hope Soldier 11 remembers our name someday...
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc: Details currently unavailable
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Soldier 11 is a member of the New Eridu Defense Force.
She currently serves as a primary responder in the Obol squad, Obsidian Division. Soldier 11 is a code name — her real name remains unknown.
"...My name? I gave it up long ago.
It's only a reminder of my past, and the past makes you weak."

Soldier 11 is a fan of spicy food, and likes the super-spicy noodles served at Waterfall Soup.
It's worth noting she currently calls us by a different name every time she greets us.
Additional information regarding Soldier 11 is still being obtained.
UnlockCondition: Complete Agent Story "Mole in the Hole"

1.Name: Rapid Heat
1.Desc: When Soldier 11 enters combat or switches in, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.
1.Desc2:
Long-term high-intensity combat training allows Soldier 11 to complete mastery of her regulatory systems.
She will always strive to ensure that she's in the best shape for each and every battle.

2.Name: Scorching Convergence
2.Desc: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.
2.Desc2:
"She may look cold and hard, like a big ice cube... But actually, she's scalding hot inside, like a blazing fire."
— From an anonymous soldier of the Obsidian Division

3.Name: Elite Soldier
3.Desc2: Soldier 11 always expects the most from herself, no matter if it's in training or physical combat. That is how she maintains her combat prowess.

4.Name: Indulgent Blaze
4.Desc:
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of Soldier 11's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, Anti-Interrupt Level increases and DMG received is reduced by 18% during skill activation.
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 4th hit of her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, she becomes invulnerable during skill activation.
4.Desc2: She envies fire. And these smoldering flames will always help her.

5.Name: Perfect Soldier
5.Desc2: The road from elite to exemplar is long and difficult, but Soldier 11 grits her teeth and perseveres, as if there's something pushing her towards the goal of becoming a perfect soldier...

6.Name: Scorching Flow
6.Desc:
When Soldier 11 uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks).
When <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>.
6.Desc2: The flames of the sword distorted the air with their heat. Her movements grew ever more impassioned, as if that heat seeped into her spirit with every breath, igniting her thoughts.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
The first time I saw him, I was definitely taken aback...
Who would've thought Ben was unexpectedly a soft, furry, gentle-natured bear!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Never judge a book by its cover.
That said, it seems he's often required to present a menacing image to deter the enemy... and it appears to be quite effective.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Ben possesses outstanding Ether aptitude, and is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Based on the data, Ben's Ether aptitude places him in the top tier at Belobog Heavy Industries. Coupled with his Thiren traits (better adaptation to Hollow environments than humans, faster mutation rate after exposure to corruption, but also rapid recovery), he is deemed highly suitable for long-term work within Hollows.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Ben is the financial and asset management director at Belobog Heavy Industries and one of Koleda's trusted aides.
"I enjoy mathematics, but that doesn't stop me from giving thugs a good smack."
He's a burly and strong Thiren. Despite his tough exterior, he's of a surprisingly sensitive and detail-oriented nature, especially when it comes to numbers.
Originally a frontline mechanical operator at Belobog, his talents caught Koleda's discerning eye, leading to his promotion to a managerial position responsible for the company's finances.
Grateful for Koleda's trust in him, he remains profoundly loyal to her.
His favorite food is black caviar, but he dislikes fish.

I once witnessed this imposing figure seated in a small office chair, wearing small glasses, and carefully cross-referencing Belobog's asset records while mashing away at a calculator with his huge fingers.
Question: Is that what they call on Inter-Knot a "Kawaii Curveball?"

TrustLv.1:

TrustLv.3: Deducing from relevant data, Ben's current outfit and style is chosen to better serve Belobog Industries rather than from his own preference.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Debt Reconciliation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Missing Invoice
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Incoming Expense
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Strikes enemies in front of him, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Accounts Settled
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Fiscal Fist
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attack before unleashing a forward strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while launching strikes.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Cashflow Counter
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attacks before unleashing a forward strike, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
When this skill is activated, the Shield is restored to its maximum value.
After activating the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again to follow up with a powerful forward strike, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Ben is invulnerable while launching strikes.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Signed and Sealed
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Complete Payback
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When activating the skill, additionally recover 3 Assist Points.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Joint Account
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Risk Allocation
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Don't Break Contract
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
