1.Name: Reacting Force
1.Desc: When successfully Blocking an enemy with Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the DMG dealt by the blocked enemy is reduced by 30% for 15s.
1.Desc2:
"Every action has an equal and opposite reaction. So why do you have to bash things head-on?"
"Looks like your calculations are off."

2.Name: Offense Through Defense
2.Desc: When successfully triggering a Block Counter during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, inflict an additional 300% of Ben's DEF as DMG.
2.Desc2:
Unlike other bear Thirens, Ben remains patient when fighting.
He believes if he keeps his defenses up, he can wait until the enemy reveals their weakness.

3.Name: Careful Accounting
3.Desc2: Financial responsibility demands mastering cost-efficiency and utilizing every available resource to enhance both the team and oneself.

4.Name: Agile Adaptation
4.Desc: When successfully blocking enemy DMG with Ben's invulnerable effect during his <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the following counter deals 30% more DMG.
4.Desc2:
Ben's professional accounting instincts let him adapt dynamically based on the situation.
Whether dealing with accounts or enemies, it's important to achieve the best results at the lowest cost.

5.Name: Meticulous Detail
5.Desc2: Ben's keen eye doesn't miss a single error in statements. The same goes for combat, where he gets progressively stronger as he corrects mistakes.

6.Name: Wild Spirit
6.Desc: After launching an attack or follow-up attack during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Daze inflicted by <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> is increased by 20%, lasting 12s.
6.Desc2:
Bear Thirens are different from canine Thirens.
They can't be appeased with food alone.
When they lose their temper, the only thing you can do is run for your life...
—The discontinued "Be a Good Neighbor! 100 Tips for Getting Along With Thirens"

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Look here, Wise! Can you believe Fairy wants us to try Rina's dishes? She just keeps getting meaner!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: We don't need to take on such a high level of risk at the moment. I suggest Fairy refrain from making such suggestions next time.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile:
Rina, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: The floating Bangboo accompanying Rina also exhibit excellent Ether adaptability.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Rina, the head maid of Victoria Housekeeping Co., and the most senior member of the organization.
She possesses beauty and grace, appearing immaculate from head to toe, with a noble demeanor and a gentle smile on her face.
She places considerable importance on how she is perceived by others.

Rina is always accompanied by two Bangboo named Anastella (brown hair) and Drusilla (blonde hair), both of whom have distinct personalities.
Drusilla has been with Rina for a significant period of time and displays high intelligence, capable of discerning Rina's true emotions and thoughts.
Anastella, a recent addition, usually responds rather than initiates conversation and is frequently teased by Drusilla.

Rina's favorite hobby is cooking, but only a few individuals are capable of enduring the dishes she prepares.
Suggestion: You may try tasting Rina's dishes as a test to determine if you are the Chosen One.
UnlockCondition: Complete Agent Story "Until Your Memory Fades"

TrustLv.1:
Rina, the head maid of Victoria Housekeeping Co., and the most senior member of the organization.
She possesses beauty and grace, appearing immaculate from head to toe, with a noble demeanor and a gentle smile on her face.
She places considerable importance on how she is perceived by others.

Rina is always accompanied by two Bangboo named Anastella (brown hair) and Drusilla (blonde hair), both of whom have distinct personalities.
Drusilla has been with Rina for a significant period of time and displays high intelligence, capable of discerning Rina's true emotions and thoughts.
Anastella, a recent addition, usually responds rather than initiates conversation and is frequently teased by Drusilla.

Rina's favorite hobby is cooking, but only a few individuals are capable of enduring the dishes she prepares.
Suggestion: You may try tasting Rina's dishes as a test to determine if you are the Chosen One.
TrustLv.3:
To protect her impeccable image, Rina maintains a professional and gracious demeanor even with the most challenging clients.
Drusilla, however, may occasionally express her true thoughts regardless of the situation.

* Rina's family holds significant influence within the industry, as all of its members have served as attendants or maids to some of the most prominent figures.
Lycaon learned some of his attendant skills from Rina.

Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to attack up to 4 times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Performing other actions with Rina during Drusilla and Anastella's attacks will not interrupt Rina's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> combo count.

Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:

Description.Desc:

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Dimwit Disappearing Trick
Chain Attack: Code of Conduct
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate a ball-shaped electrical field that deals massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to perform <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attacks</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color>, but can be recalled to Rina's side through <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: Ultimate: The Queen's Attendants
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to respond to <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> commands, but can be recalled to Rina's side through <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool</color>.
Upon activating this skill, the other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in recovers an additional 20 Energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Duple Meter Allemande
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: Triple Meter Courante
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Quadruple Meter Gavotte
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate an electrical vortex, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Dance Duet
1.Desc:
After being sent out to launch an attack, Drusilla and Anastella stay in place for an additional 5.5s before returning to Rina.
The effect gained from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner</color> by characters within 10m is increased to 130% of the original value.
1.Desc2:
"Get your work done, or you're in for a beating!" is how Drusilla tries to encourage everyone.
"Yeah, a beating!" Anastella always chimes in.

2.Name: Master's Paragon
2.Desc: Upon entering combat or switching in, Rina's DMG increases by 15% for 12s. This effect can trigger once every 18s.
2.Desc2: "It takes an excellent head maid to lead excellent maids, and an exemplary master to raise exemplary Bangboo." — Excerpt from Rina's speech at the "Victoria Housekeeping Human Resource Management and Bangboo Training Insight Seminar."

3.Name: Head Maid's Specialty
3.Desc2:
Rina always has the confidence to excel at anything and the ability to annihilate everything.
However, when it comes to being in the mood to annihilate enemies, both her confidence and capability align.

4.Name: Needle and Hammer
4.Desc: Rina's Energy Regen increases by 0.5/s when both Drusilla and Anastella are deployed. The effect ends when Drusilla or Anastella returns to Rina.
4.Desc2:
Drusilla and Anastella can never agree on anything.
"Beating up the dummy in front" is an exception.

5.Name: Head Maid Perfectionist
5.Desc2:
"Rina" means perfection in the Bangboo language.
Perfectionism is the number one rule in the Victoria Housekeeping handbook.
And Rina has her own criteria for judging "perfection."

6.Name: Stormy Night's Fright
6.Desc: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, the entire squad's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> is increased by 15% for 8s.
6.Desc2:
Thunder rumbles in the old castle on a rainy night. The depths of the long corridors are filled with eerie shadows.
Fear circuits overloaded, the filming of a thriller commences.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Lucy's Knock Knock profile pic is soooo pretty! Is that what she looked like back when she was still living as a rich heiress?
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: I think Caesar mentioned Lucy only uses this profile picture because it's incredibly effective when it comes to talking business with others...
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Luciana Auxesis Theodoro de Montefio, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: FYI, Luciana Auxesis Theodoro de Montefio is Lucy's full name.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Lucy is currently in charge of outgoing business and managing boars for the Sons of Calydon.
Since her name is far too long and she doesn't want to be involved with her family, she refers to herself as just "Lucy" in the Outer Ring.
Her three boars are called Grassy, Woody, and Bricky, and they're unceasingly loyal to her.
Though Lucy often speaks with a mixture of rough and elegant language, her actions subtly betray the marks of a proper education.
Lucy's family is incredibly wealthy. She grew up very privileged, with anything she could ever want within grasp... except for freedom.
After her Ether Aptitude test results came back high, Lucy decided she wanted to be a Hollow Investigator, but her family disapproved. She was met with harsh words, isolation and confinement, and emotional abuse which led to her deciding to leave to find her own freedom.
"Hmph! There's no chance I'll ever go back! If I'm found... then I can say goodbye to the stars and sky and I'll have to inherit the family business instead!"
Lucy is extremely competitive. She loves to win and hates losing.
Currently, the one who has given her the most bitter taste of defeat is Caesar, so Lucy keeps challenging Caesar to duels, losing then challenging again, challenging then losing again.
UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Unexpected New Customers" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 4) to unlock

TrustLv.1:
Lucy is currently in charge of outgoing business and managing boars for the Sons of Calydon.
Since her name is far too long and she doesn't want to be involved with her family, she refers to herself as just "Lucy" in the Outer Ring.
Her three boars are called Grassy, Woody, and Bricky, and they're unceasingly loyal to her.
Though Lucy often speaks with a mixture of rough and elegant language, her actions subtly betray the marks of a proper education.
Lucy's family is incredibly wealthy. She grew up very privileged, with anything she could ever want within grasp... except for freedom.
After her Ether Aptitude test results came back high, Lucy decided she wanted to be a Hollow Investigator, but her family disapproved. She was met with harsh words, isolation and confinement, and emotional abuse which led to her deciding to leave to find her own freedom.
"Hmph! There's no chance I'll ever go back! If I'm found... then I can say goodbye to the stars and sky and I'll have to inherit the family business instead!"
Lucy is extremely competitive. She loves to win and hates losing.
Currently, the one who has given her the most bitter taste of defeat is Caesar, so Lucy keeps challenging Caesar to duels, losing then challenging again, challenging then losing again.
TrustLv.3:
The way Lucy joined the Sons of Calydon was both comedic and dramatic.
To run away from home, she hired some "kidnappers" and devised a kidnapping for herself. Yet, this plan was accidentally screwed up by the Sons of Calydon — Caesar defeated all the "kidnappers" and saved their "victim."
According to eye-witness testimony, the sight of Caesar crashing straight through the door on her ride with the sunlight behind her left quite the impression on Lucy.
"That was when I saw it — freedom."
From then on, Lucy stuck with Caesar, eager to join the Sons of Calydon.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Lady's Bat
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Strike forward up to 4 times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When Lucy uses her fourth <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the currently on-field guard boars will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color> together.

Description.Name: Guard Boars: To Arms!
Description.Desc: In combat, the guard boars will randomly use a baseball bat, boxing gloves, or a slingshot to automatically attack enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!
Description.Desc: When Lucy uses the fourth <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, or when she gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status, the guard boars will whirl their baseball bats in a continuous motion, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> to nearby enemies. If the attack cannot be executed immediately, the guard boars will remember the required number of times to execute it.

Description.Name: Dodge: Foul Ball!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Fearless Boar!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during dodge to activate:
Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Returning Tusk!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Perfect Dodge to activate:

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Solid Hit!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Home Run!
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.
With enough Energy, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Cheer On!
Description.Desc: After using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, when a guard boar triggers an explosion, it will apply the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status to all allies, Bangboo, and the guard boars themselves. While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status, allies' ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:13+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.8,1,2}%</color> of Lucy's initial ATK + <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:40+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*4,1,2}</color>, up to a maximum of 600. The <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status lasts for 10s when a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color> is hit, and 15s when a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color> is hit. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Grand Slam!
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Lucy jumps up and sends a guard boar at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Walk-Off Home Run!
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch all guard boars sequentially, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> in a large area to enemies ahead.
While using this skill, other squad members recover 10 energy, and the next character to switch in gains an additional 20 energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Hit By Pitch!
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Safe on Base!
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Scored a Run!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Drill Formations
1.Desc: When the guard boars launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>, Lucy recovers 2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 15s, with each guard boar having its own separate cooldown.
1.Desc2:
"Grassy, eyes right! ...That's left, you idiot!!!"
One command, two directions, three cries of pain, and wails all around.

2.Name: Little Boar Captain
2.Desc: When Lucy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, it grants all squad members, Bangboo, and the guard boars the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status for 10s.
2.Desc2:
"Without a doubt, Captain Lucy is the best leader of the Calydon Boar Thirens!"
This was Woody's conclusion in the "Sons of Calydon Annual Report."

3.Name: Ironfist Overseer
3.Desc2:
"I just wish Captain Lucy would be more gentle when she's smacking us around."
Woody thought, but didn't dare say it out loud.

4.Name: Chaos Ball Game
4.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state, allies' CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 10%.
4.Desc2: Rules and ribs are made to be broken.

5.Name: Wildland Princess
5.Desc2:
She speaks politely to opponents screaming under her bat.
She apologizes to enemies groveling at her feet.
This is the perfect etiquette of a noble lady.

6.Name: Fierce Fangs of Fire
6.Desc: When an ally in the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state hits an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, a guard boar will drop from the sky and cause an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to 300% of the guard boar's ATK. This will extend the duration of the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> buff for all squad members by 5s. The duration can increase up to 3 times, with a maximum duration of 30s. Refreshing the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state resets the stack count. After the guard boar's explosion, it will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>.
6.Desc2:
The little boar Thirens known as the Crimson Mane Guard are always at the forefront of battle!
Though it's hard to tell if, at the moment they're launched by the bat, they feel total despair or just accept their fate.
Brave little boars, leading the charge!

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
What's that line from that detective movie we watched again?
"She may look like a child..." Well, no matter how old she is or how she looks, Koleda really is a kid, and she's so cute!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: I hope your comment isn't seen by a certain someone, or our video store will be end up smashed to bits by a hammer.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Koleda, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: "Young girls should limit their activity in environments like Hollows."
— Excerpt from a handwritten medical record by a doctor. Surprisingly, the time spent deciphering the handwriting in this sentence took longer than the entire search process itself.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Koleda is the current head of Belobog Industries, and the biological daughter of the company's founder, Khors.
Her father, Khors, vanished due to a scandal involving embezzlement and fled, which severely shook the company, nearly driving it to the brink of collapse. Once she came of age, Koleda willingly stepped up to untangle the mess, rallying the remaining company workforce and resources to revive the financially and reputationally vulnerable Belobog Heavy Industries.
With the help of new invaluable team members, Belobog eventually managed to regain its prominence in relevant sectors. Though not as resplendent as its prime, Belobog in its current state is still a notable newcomer in the field.
Throughout her journey, Koleda amassed practical life experiences and professional know-how, building a circle of colleagues who back her up like family. Yet, to present herself as a leader, Koleda appears to intentionally adopt a stern tone when communicating with others.
This distinct growth trajectory has also contributed to Koleda's heightened maturity in certain aspects compared to her peers. 
Naturally, she might display a bit of childishness in certain aspects as well.
Hypothesis: Koleda's comparatively smaller stature among her peers may stem from her prolonged involvement in the Hollows. 
Currently, there aren't any publicly accessible papers or research substantiating this theory, but I will continue to track this topic.

TrustLv.3:
From analysis of her behavior, it's evident that Koleda is actually quite fond of sweets, even though she's hesitant to openly admit it. 
The suspected rationale behind this is that she views enjoying sweets as a childish inclination and doesn't want others to perceive her as immature. 
Furthermore, Koleda seems particularly sensitive to any descriptors associated with children, and mentioning such terms could trigger her annoyance. 
"Just remember, I'm the perfect height for your shinbone, so you might wanna reconsider before labeling me as childish."

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Smash 'n' Bash

When Koleda and Ben are deployed together, executing an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> will trigger a coordinated attack from both, further increasing the move's power;
Koleda is invulnerable during the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack's</color> 4th hit and enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

1.Name: Beat of the Hammer
1.Desc: After the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or her enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, quickly use a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to increase the Daze dealt by 15%.
1.Desc2: Her fiery temper is just a facade. In reality, Koleda's thoughts are quite intricate. For example, she knows when to swing her hammer for a more painful strike.

2.Name: Kinetic Recovery
2.Desc: When Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, she recovers 60 Energy. Can trigger once every 45s.
2.Desc2:
Koleda believes perfect hammering has its own natural rhythm.
It's like tapping a tambourine, with each hit building up the tempo of the next beat.
Of course, it's hard to say how many taps her "toys" can endure.

3.Name: "Mind Your Own!"
3.Desc2:
As a qualified "toy," you better not cause trouble when Koleda starts to get a feel for swinging her hammer. Just take the beating.
—After all, what's the point of resisting?

4.Name: Furnace's Glow
4.Desc: Koleda gains one stack of Charge (max 2 stacks) when consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use her Enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. When her <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, she consumes all stacks of Charge to increase the attack's DMG by 18% per stack.
4.Desc2:
Koleda feels the flames of war as her hammer swings raise the surrounding temperature.
She's now even more flammable and explosive than Ether.

5.Name: "You Dare Underestimate Me?"
5.Desc2: Koleda cares deeply about her role as a young leader potentially causing others to underestimate Belobog Heavy Industries. To compensate, she consistently trains diligently in secret.

6.Name: Saturated Blast
6.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> triggers an explosion that hits an enemy, it deals additional DMG equal to 360% of Koleda's ATK.
6.Desc2:
There are two types of people that Koleda really hates:
Stupid people, and hopelessly stupid people.
Luckily for her, Belobog always has a good supply of strong Ether explosives — plenty to use on the stupid.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Where did Fairy even get this info? So even a perfect person like Yanagi has her clumsy moments? Got any specifics to share?
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: How should I put this...? From this data, it feels like Section 6 would fall apart without Yanagi.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
Hollow Investigative Association Licensing Archive:
Executive Officer Tsukishiro Yanagi, Ether aptitude confidential, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Tsukishiro Yanagi has good Ether aptitude and the specific details can be obtained via the Hollow Special Operations system... including a report containing a blood analysis with peculiar results.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Tsukishiro Yanagi, Hollow Special Operations Section 6 Deputy Chief and intelligence officer.
Primarily responsible for personnel management, mission management and feedback, collecting intel, on-site support, etc.
At the same time, Yanagi is also Section 6 member Soukaku's Protector. Apart from taking care of Soukaku's day-to-day affairs, she is also responsible for and takes responsibility for all of Soukaku's behavior at work.

Section 6 Chief Hoshimi Miyabi possesses a rather eccentric personality; Asaba Harumasa, a member of Section 6, is overly relaxed and carefree; and Soukaku, another member of Section, 6 is still an innocent and excitable child, so most of the team's work falls upon Yanagi's shoulders.
Serious, diligent, and meticulous, Tsukishiro Yanagi is the only "normal" person on the team, so to speak. It is only due to her guidance and leadership that the strength of the three who make up Section 6's primary on-field force can be transformed into true combat power.
Overall, Tsukishiro Yanagi is a talented and highly efficient executive officer, whose abilities are both exceptional and comprehensive.
However, from certain data, Tsukishiro Yanagi appears to have a somewhat clumsy side to her when it comes to day-to-day affairs.
UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Unexpected New Customers" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 4) to unlock

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Tsukuyomi Kagura
Description.Desc:
Yanagi has two stances: <color=#FFFFFF>Jougen</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Kagen</color>.
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Execute up to five forward slashes based on the current stance, causing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During combat, Yanagi gains the corresponding stance buff based on her current stance:
<color=#FFFFFF>Jougen</color> stance buff: <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> increases by 10%. Anti-Interrupt Level increases during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Kagen</color> stance buff: PEN Ratio increases by 10%. Interrupt Level increases for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
For 8s after switching stances, Yanagi retains the bonus from the previous stance.

Description.Name: Dodge: Wandering Breeze
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Fleeting Flight
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Rapid Retaliation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Ruten
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Perform a forward slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>, and switch the current stance.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
If activated after the 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, it activates <color=#FFFFFF>Swift Ruten</color>, speeding up the slashes while switching her current stance.
Block enemy attacks while <color=#FFFFFF>Swift Ruten</color> is active.
Upon activating <color=#FFFFFF>Swift Ruten</color>, Yanagi can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Gekka Ruten
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Charge up power for a quick forward thrust, followed by a downward attack, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon executing the thrust, Yanagi switches stances and enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Shinrabanshou</color> state, lasting 15s. For the duration of this state, when following up with a subsequent <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> from the 5th hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or other skills, the combo will begin directly from the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
If the downward attack hits an enemy suffering an Anomaly, it triggers a special <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect, <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color>, dealing 15% of the original <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect's DMG to the target, plus an additional <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:5+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*2.25,100,2}%</color> of Yanagi's Anomaly Proficiency. <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color> will not remove the target's Anomaly.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Celestial Harmony
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Switch stances and unleash a powerful slash on enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Raiei Tenge
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Yanagi unleashes her potential and delivers a powerful slash to a large area of enemies in front in a very short time, followed by an additional lightning strike, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the lightning strike hits an enemy affected by an Attribute Anomaly, it triggers a special <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect called <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color>. This deals DMG equal to 15% of the original <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect plus an additional <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:5+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*2.25,100,2}%</color> of Yanagi's Anomaly Proficiency. <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color> will not remove the target's Anomaly.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Yanagi can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Blade of Elegance
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Radiant Reversal
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Weeping Willow Stab
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Switch stances, and quickly deliver multiple slashes to enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Name: Core Passive: Lunar Eclipse
Additional Ability: Gessou
Desc:
After Yanagi activates her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the DMG multiplier of <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> is increased by <color=#2BAD00>125%</color> when any squad member applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect to an enemy, lasting 15s.
When her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, Yanagi's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> against the target is increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 15s.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same attribute:
After switching stances, when Yanagi hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tsukuyomi Kagura</color>, <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 45% for 8s.

After Yanagi activates her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the DMG multiplier of <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> is increased by <color=#2BAD00>250%</color> when any squad member applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect to an enemy, lasting 15s.

1.Name: Know Thy Self, Know Thy Enemy
1.Desc: When any squad member inflicts an Anomaly on an enemy, Yanagi gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Clarity</color>, lasting 15s, stacking up to 3 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Upon being hit by an enemy attack, Yanagi consumes 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Clarity</color> to gain invulnerability for 1s. When Yanagi has 1 or more stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Clarity</color>, her Anomaly Proficiency increases by 80.
1.Desc2:
"Having the clarity to see your enemy's weakness is like an extra safety net... and it increasing your chances at victory."
Yanagi adjusts her glasses, remaining as composed as ever, even when victory is already assured.

2.Name: Outstanding Adaptability
2.Desc: During her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the rapid thrust's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 20%. Holding down the Special Attack button after a rapid thrust hits an enemy will consume 10 additional Energy to launch another thrust. If Energy is insufficient or the button is released, the attack automatically follows up with the downward attack. When the downward attack hits an enemy suffering an Anomaly and triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color>, the DMG multiplier increases to 20% of the original <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect. Each additional thrust increases this multiplier by 15%, up to a maximum of 2 extra thrusts.
2.Desc2:
"Yanagi can handle any unfamiliar environment thrown her way."
"I believe in her more than I believe in myself."
— From a martial artist practicing "the cutting of fallen leaves."

3.Name: Tsukishiro Style Management
3.Desc2: Everyone says Section 6 is gathering oddballs and geniuses, with Tsukishiro Yanagi being the only "normal" one. But it’s precisely her presence that holds the oddballs and geniuses together.

4.Name: Chessmaster
4.Desc: When Yanagi inflicts Attribute Anomaly DMG on an enemy, they suffer the <color=#FFFFFF>Exposed</color> effect, lasting 15s. Attacks on enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Expose</color> effect will have 16% increased PEN Ratio.
4.Desc2: No matter the situation, Tsukishiro Yanagi can rapidly grasp all the information at hand and make the most appropriate decision.

5.Name: "Other Mother"
5.Desc2:
At present, Tsukishiro Yanagi is the sole designated guardian of Soukaku.
"Soukaku, this is the Chief's riceball, you mustn't eat it... forget it, come here, I'll heat it up for you."
"We'll just buy a similar one for the Chief later."

6.Name: Inhuman Blood
6.Desc: After a thrust attack during her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the duration of the <color=#FFFFFF>Shinrabanshou</color> state increases to 30s. While the state is active, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> DMG increases by 20%. The maximum number of times the additional DMG multiplier increase effect for <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color> in <color=#FFFFFF>Outstanding Adaptability</color> can be triggered increases to 4, and the Energy cost for the first 4 additional thrust attacks is halved.
6.Desc2:
Flowing through Tsukishiro Yanagi's veins is blood that isn’t entirely her own. This blood once granted her new life in the face of despair, and with it, she gained certain special powers.
"But as you know, something that isn't mine... comes with a price."

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Seth really is a feline Thiren! He's like a kitty magnet.
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
I remember seeing him being completely surrounded by stray cats on the street once.
Must be nice to be so loved by cats.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
HIA License Archive:
Public Security Patrol Officer, Seth, Ether aptitude is classified. He's allowed to perform basic tasks like conducting investigations and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: (Omitted clearance-related details) As a Lynx Thiren, Seth has exceptional Ether aptitude.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Seth, a rookie officer in the Public Security Criminal Investigation Special Response Team, is a key player in providing fire support during criminal investigations.
He graduated at the top of his class in the academy and could have landed a higher position, but he chose the tougher path of the Special Response Team.
His impressive profile makes him seem like a genius, but he's actually a hard worker who has had his own struggles. There have been times when he practiced the subjects he wasn't good at until he cried.
Seth is quite smart, but his personality often leads to him being taken advantage of by cunning criminals, or sometimes, coworkers (?).
The subject he's worst at is infiltration. Rumor has it that he holds the academy record for "fastest to get busted" in infiltration tasks. Based on the video intel we have, he seems a bit slow to catch on. For instance, when someone is being sarcastic, it takes him a long time to realize it.

TrustLv.1:
Seth, a rookie officer in the Public Security Criminal Investigation Special Response Team, is a key player in providing fire support during criminal investigations.
He graduated at the top of his class in the academy and could have landed a higher position, but he chose the tougher path of the Special Response Team.
His impressive profile makes him seem like a genius, but he's actually a hard worker who has had his own struggles. There have been times when he practiced the subjects he wasn't good at until he cried.
Seth is quite smart, but his personality often leads to him being taken advantage of by cunning criminals, or sometimes, coworkers (?).
The subject he's worst at is infiltration. Rumor has it that he holds the academy record for "fastest to get busted" in infiltration tasks. Based on the video intel we have, he seems a bit slow to catch on. For instance, when someone is being sarcastic, it takes him a long time to realize it.
TrustLv.3:
The profile shows that Seth has an older brother who holds a higher position in Public Security.
To some, Seth is a rookie riding on family connections within Public Security, but he got in on his own merit and has nothing to do with his brother's influence.
Currently, they are not on good terms. When they encounter each other at work, they pretend not to know one another.
Seth views his brother as a rival he must surpass, and is working hard to achieve that goal.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Lightning Strike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color> is above or equal to 75%, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate.
Consume 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color> to launch consecutive attacks in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the Finishing Move hits an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the squad member positioned before Seth.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge: Evasion Maneuver
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Thunder Assault
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Charge forward with a shield attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Damage received during the move is decreased by 40%.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Retreat to Advance
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Unleash a quick downward slash on enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Launch two shield attacks forward, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady>to charge the move, and Seth will dash forward, unleashing a series of powerful slashes, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Activating the move accumulates 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging this skill, and damage taken is reduced by 40%.
Seth is invulnerable during the consecutive slashes.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage
Chain Attack: Final Judgement
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Launch a series of slashes in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Activating the move accumulates 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Justice Prevails
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch a series of upward attacks in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Activating the move accumulates 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>, and grants 3 additional Assist Points.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Armed Support
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a quick downward slash on enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Thundershield
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Upon activation, gain 25% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Launch a forward thrust attack, followed by two horizontal slashes, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the squad member positioned before Seth.
After activating the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to transition to <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color> and charge faster.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Protector
Additional Ability: High Spirit
Desc: When Seth uses <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, he gains a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</color> triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>40</color>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <color=#2BAD00>50</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Seth's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Final Judgement</color> or Finishing Move during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color> hits an enemy, the target's Anomaly Buildup RES to all Attributes is reduced by 20%, lasting 20s.

Name: Core Passive: Protector
Additional Ability: High Spirit
Desc: When Seth uses <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, he gains a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>50%</color> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</color> triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>50</color>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <color=#2BAD00>62</color>.

1.Name: Heroism
1.Desc: The shield value provided by <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> and its maximum limit is increased by 30%. When <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> ends, the Anomaly Proficiency increase provided by <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Protector</color> lasts an additional 10s.
1.Desc2:
When it comes to team missions, Seth is always leading the charge.
"Let me handle the arrests! I scored a 99 in close-quarters arrests, and the only point deducted was because I accidentally sprained the instructor's wrist."

2.Name: Recklessness of Youth
2.Desc: Upon entering battle, Seth immediately gains 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>. Hitting an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color> increases the move's accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by 35%.
2.Desc2:
Many criminals make the mistake of underestimating Seth.
It might be his pure, clear eyes or those innocent-looking furry ears and tail. Whatever the reason, everyone who underestimates him eventually pays the price.

3.Name: Slow Reflexes
3.Desc2:
"A skilled officer like you must handle everything on your own, right? No help from others, surely?"
Even after hearing this, Seth remained composed and didn't say a word.
It wasn't until midnight that he suddenly woke up: "Could that guy's comment earlier... have been a dig at me?"

4.Name: Core Aspiration
4.Desc: The Daze caused by <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist: Thundershield</color> is increased by 25%.
4.Desc2:
"Put aside your foolish notions of good and evil. You can't protect everyone. Sometimes, you have to make a choice."
"This is my choice, and it's the core responsibility of an officer — you're the one who has changed, Brother."

5.Name: Distant Admiration
5.Desc2:
Seth used to deeply admire and respect his older brother. But as you know, "admiration" is the furthest thing from "understanding."
"Someday, I'll become the finest officer... and make him eat his words!"

6.Name: Idealist
6.Desc: When Seth lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color>, it deals additional damage equal to 500% of his ATK. The attack is guaranteed to trigger a critical hit, and CRIT DMG is increased by 60%.
6.Desc2:
To a young person, everything is clear-cut, with a stark contrast between black and white, right and wrong.
There will always be someone who tries to tell him that the world is a murky gray. But is a world where everything is clear-cut and distinct really not worth striving for?

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Burnice sure makes delicious drinks! No wonder she's famous in the Outer Ring.
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: Yeah, so long as we don't try her blends for Steeltusk.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
There's no record of Burnice in the New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile.
Note: Burnice has a good Aptitude for Ether
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Burnice, the Nitro-Fuel bartender for the Sons of Calydon.
A hopeless fuel lover. She is responsible for all the fuel used by the machinery owned by the Sons of Calydon.
She seems to have a passion for fuel that overwhelms all else.

Burnice is super outgoing, friendly, and carefree.
She is easily able to spread her emotions to the people around her, bringing them the same optimism she possesses.
"You like the drinks I mix? Thank you! Steeltusk does, too~ That big guy can drink two hundred liters in one go!"
"Do you wanna try its special fuel blend? It's suuuuper hot!"
UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Unexpected New Customers" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 4) to unlock

TrustLv.1:
Burnice, the Nitro-Fuel bartender for the Sons of Calydon.
A hopeless fuel lover. She is responsible for all the fuel used by the machinery owned by the Sons of Calydon.
She seems to have a passion for fuel that overwhelms all else.

Burnice is super outgoing, friendly, and carefree.
She is easily able to spread her emotions to the people around her, bringing them the same optimism she possesses.
"You like the drinks I mix? Thank you! Steeltusk does, too~ That big guy can drink two hundred liters in one go!"
"Do you wanna try its special fuel blend? It's suuuuper hot!"
TrustLv.3:
"Fire can bring warmth, but it can also burn. For someone like this, when used with good intentions, they can keep the cold at bay, but when used with bad intentions... well, that idiot Caesar couldn't think of any bad intentions if her life depended on it."
—From a certain young heiress who wishes to remain anonymous

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Direct Flame Blend
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend
Description.Desc:
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Spin continuously while spraying flames around, followed by a Finishing Move that inflicts <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Continuing to hold extends the flame-spraying duration.
When the move is activated, it consumes 20 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>;
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
After executing the Finishing Move, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Fiery Phantom Dash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Dangerous Fermentation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Perform a forward rush attack with the flamethrower, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Fluttering Steps
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Launch a series of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleash a fire blast forward, inflicting <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>;
Press and hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to charge, boosting the move's power.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method
Description.Desc:
With enough energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Continuously spray flames with a one-handed flamethrower, then release a fire blast in a straight line ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Continue holding to steadily consume energy and extend the spray's duration.
While continuously spraying, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to execute a sidestep dodge, adjusting your position in the corresponding direction.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while continuously spraying, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Character is invulnerable during sidestep dodge and fire blast.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
Description.Desc:
While using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color>, with enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Use both flamethrowers to continuously spray flames, followed by a fire blast in a front line, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Keep holding to continue consuming Energy and extend the spray's duration.
Character is invulnerable during the moment the spray is activated and during the activation of the fire blast.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while spraying, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method
EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method
EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
Chain Attack: Fuel-Fed Flame
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Quickly dash forward while spraying flames in all directions, then launch a fire blast in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Glorious Inferno
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Dash forward quickly, then leap into the air and continuously spray flames over a wide area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When leaping into the air, a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered. If the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is activated, Burnice will extend the duration of her flame spray.
Upon activation, recover 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Energizing Specialty Drink
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a flurry of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Smoky Cauldron
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Scorching Dew
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap into the air and quickly spin forward while spraying flames in all directions, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

Name: Core Passive: Nitro-Fuel Cocktail
Additional Ability: Fire Kindling
Desc:
When Burnice expends Energy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, up to a max of 100. She gains 1.4 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> for each 1 point of Energy consumed. At 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state until all <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> is expended. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice instantly accumulates 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, when Burnice hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> effect to the target until she exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state. When other squad members hit enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> status, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, expending 8 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> to deal <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>175%</color> of Burnice's ATK and accumulate <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>. This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. For every 10 Anomaly Proficiency, <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> DMG increases by 1%, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Burnice's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> hits an enemy, or when the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is triggered, the move's accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 65%. When any squad member applies the <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

When Burnice's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> hits an enemy, or when the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is triggered, the move's accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 65%. When any squad member applies the <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

Name: Core Passive: Nitro-Fuel Cocktail
Additional Ability: Fire Kindling
Desc:
When Burnice expends Energy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, up to a max of 100. She gains 1.4 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> for each 1 point of Energy consumed. At 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state until all <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> is expended. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice instantly accumulates 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, when Burnice hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> effect to the target until she exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state. When other squad members hit enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> status, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, expending 8 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> to deal <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>320%</color> of Burnice's ATK and accumulate <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>. This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. For every 10 Anomaly Proficiency, <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> DMG increases by 1%, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Burnice's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> hits an enemy, or when the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is triggered, the move's accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 65%. When any squad member applies the <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. For every 10 Anomaly Proficiency, <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> DMG increases by 1%, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG.

When any squad member applies the <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

1.Name: Kindred Flames
1.Desc: Increases the limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> from 100 to 140. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice accumulates an additional 40 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. Increases the DMG Multiplier of the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect by 100% of Burnice's ATK. Additionally, the accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is increased by 25%.
1.Desc2:
"Everyone has rough times; it's perfectly normal!"
"Cheer up, Caesar! How about a Nitro-Fuel special? I added a ton of sugar!"

2.Name: Extra at No Additional Charge
2.Desc: When triggering the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color> is applied to the enemy, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 6s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When any allied unit in the squad hits the enemy, the attack's PEN Ratio is increased by 4% for each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color>, up to a max of 20%.
2.Desc2:
As the mixologist for the Sons of Calydon, Burnice takes great pleasure in crafting the best Nitro-Fuel drinks in New Eridu for her friends.
Of course, if you happen to be her enemy... you might have the opportunity to try a new and unique flavor too.
"It's a once-in-a-lifetime, absolutely exquisite taste!"

3.Name: Optimistic by Nature
3.Desc2:
"That Burnice, she's always so full of energy! Even right after waking up! I have no idea where she gets all that energy..."
"What's even scarier is that she can get everyone around her to be just as enthusiastic! It's almost like she's some kind of monster!"
"But... I don't really dislike it, to be honest..."
— From a boar manager who wishes to remain unnamed

4.Name: Ultimate Fuel Supply
4.Desc: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> hits an enemy, the move's CRIT Rate increases by 30%. The max flame spray duration of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> is increased by 1s.
4.Desc2:
"You like the drink I mixed? Thanks! Steeltusk likes them too~ That guy can drink 200 liters in one go!"
"Oh, Steeltusk is our big truck!"
"Wanna try some of its special fuel? It's pretty fiery~"

5.Name: Dance of Fire and Ice
5.Desc2:
When mixing drinks, ice is a crucial element.
Without an intense chill, the intense heat just doesn't stand out.
"That fusion of fire and ice~ It's truly captivating!"

6.Name: Burning Invitation
6.Desc: When Burnice hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, it triggers an additional special <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, dealing 60% of Burnice's ATK as <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to the target. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s and does not consume <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. After hitting an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, while the move is active, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, special <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effects, and <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effects will ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>. When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>'s fire blast hits an enemy, if that enemy is <color=#FF5521>Burned</color>, trigger an additional instance of <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> DMG equal to 1,800% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 20s for each target.
6.Desc2:
It seems like no one has ever seen Burnice truly angry.
"Trust me, you don't want to see it."
— From a driver getting ready to sleep atop Steeltusk

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
I was somewhat surprised to see Ellen in her school uniform...
For her, working in Victoria Housekeeping is something like a part-time job outside of school, right? That's impressive!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: In a way, we're also working a part-time job, Belle...
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile:
Ellen, with a good aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: The remaining information about Ellen is currently archived in a certain school in New Eridu.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Ellen is a maid working for Victoria Housekeeping Co. and its latest member.
She is a laid-back individual who dislikes activities that require energy. However, with the full support of her teammates, she can unleash her formidable power during critical moments.
Since her fighting style leads to high energy consumption, she always carries a lollipop in her mouth to ensure an adequate sugar intake.
While she frequently expresses her desire to change jobs due to the hassle, she genuinely values her companions at Victoria Housekeeping.

Ellen attends a school in New Eridu and has a group of ordinary friends.
Apart from her role as a maid at Victoria Housekeeping, Ellen spends a significant amount of time with her friends, leading an ordinary and contented student life.

Thoughts: As a multitasker, Ellen must balance her student life with her job at Victoria Housekeeping Co.
Perhaps this is one of the reasons why she often feels tired?
