Thoughts: As a multitasker, Ellen must balance her student life with her job at Victoria Housekeeping Co.
Perhaps this is one of the reasons why she often feels tired?
TrustLv.3:
Ellen appears to possess a unique sense of taste that differs from that of ordinary people. Her teammate Rina consistently prepares various "whimsical" dishes, and Ellen is the only one who can consume them without breaking a sweat.

Suggestion: Perhaps you could also sample Rina's dishes. I will compare your reaction with Ellen's to gather more significant data.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Saw Teeth Trimming
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to 3 attacks at enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Each attack consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

Description.Name: Dodge: Vortex
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A rapid dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, Ellen gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect, reducing the charge time of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, lasting up to 5 seconds or until it triggers.

Description.Name: Dash: Roaming Hunt
Description.Desc:
Hold or double-press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
Enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, allowing dashing movement.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to control Ellen's direction, and release to stop.
Ellen is invulnerable for a brief time after activation.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Delivers a spinning slash to enemies before opening her scissors for a Swift Scissors strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when the Swift Scissors strike hits.

While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform a spinning slash against the enemy, then pull apart the scissors to unleash a Charged Scissors strike, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when the Charged Scissors strike hits. If the enemy is <color=#98EFF0>Frozen</color>, it always triggers <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging the skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Flash Freeze
Description.Desc: When Ellen has <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> effect is activated. Once <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> activates, <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> expend <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>. Ellen can have up to a maximum of 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Monstrous Wave
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Cold Snap
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during dodge to activate:
Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Reef Rock
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Rapidly move through enemies with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Param.Name: Swift Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained
Charged Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained

Description.Name: Special Attack: Drift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Use a quick tail sweep attack in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Perform a forceful tail whip attack that deals massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> upon striking an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd-hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Sharknami
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy and after executing <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Perform a powerful series of slashes ahead that deal massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> upon striking an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd-hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Avalanche
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Endless Winter
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm before a powerful scissor strike, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Shark Sentinel
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Speedily move through the enemy with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the character on the field is launched, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, enabling dashing movement.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions and release to stop.
Character is invulnerable briefly when triggering the skill.
Upon triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, Ellen gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect, shortening the charging time of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, lasting up to 5s or until it triggers once.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Wavefront Impact
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Shark Cruiser
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the attack to extend the skill duration.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>75%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>83.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>91.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors Strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>100%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.Name: Glacial Omen
1.Desc: Upon hitting an enemy with a Swift Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 3. Upon hitting an enemy with a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 6. For each <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> consumed, Ellen's CRIT Rate is increased by 2% for 15s, stacking up to 6 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
1.Desc2:
Chilling winds are an omen of winter, and a signal that Ellen is about to apply for extended leave to hibernate.
Speaking of which, do sharks actually need to hibernate?

2.Name: Arctic Ocean Predator
2.Desc: The 3rd hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color> can be directly followed up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Sharknami</color>. For each point of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the current attack's CRIT DMG is increased by 20%, up to a max of 60%.
2.Desc2:
Despite being freshly stained with red, the massive shears held by Ellen lacked any trace of warmth.
The icy cold stems from her iron-forged instrument, as well as the fear of facing a predator such as herself.

3.Name: Overtime-Intolerant
3.Desc2:
The whole point of "efficiency" is being able to go home early and sleep.
So strike harder and strike faster.

4.Name: Endless Hoarfrost
4.Desc: Whenever a squad member <color=#98EFF0>Freezes</color> or Stuns an enemy, Ellen gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> and the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect. She also recovers 4 Energy. The Energy recovery effect can trigger once per 10s.
4.Desc2:
A relentless assault of piercing cold. Terrifying monstrosities will learn the beauty and cruelty of winter under Ellen's blade.
But, actually, the endless work that maids have during holidays is far more cruel...

5.Name: Adequate Sleep
5.Desc2:
Except for when in the toughest of battles, Ellen always seems to have that "I can fall asleep at any moment" look.
Many an enemy has met their demise after underestimating Ellen because of it.

6.Name: The Feast Begins
6.Desc: When Ellen uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or gains <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color>, her PEN Ratio increases by 20% for 6s. She also gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. With 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, using a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color> consumes all stacks, increasing the DMG of the current attack by 250%.
6.Desc2: An open wound, a drop of blood. A thrilling hunt, a grand feast. A fragile life, a moment of satisfaction.

UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Unexpected New Customers" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 4) to unlock

Description.Name: Basic Attack: L-Form Thundering Fist
Description.Desc:
Press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform up to five forward strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
During the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick}, and repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to unleash a series of melee follow-up attacks. Release the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to follow up with the 4th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
While performing the startup light punch in the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to keep alternating between the light punch and 4th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. Release the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to follow up with the subsequent jab combo.
Continue repeatedly pressing or holding <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to extend the duration of the jab combo.
When you stop pressing or holding <IconMap:Icon_Normal>, or when the combo reaches its maximum duration, launches a Finishing Move forward. Lighter is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.
During the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, Lighter takes 40% less DMG.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased during the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, and the DMG reduction effect is increased to 80%.

Description.Name: Dodge: Shadowed Slide
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> while the character is attacking to activate:
Perform a quick shuffle dodge in the direction of the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#Joystick}.
This skill will not interrupt the combo count for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Charging Slam
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Blazing Flash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front with an uppercut, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> during a shuffle dodge to activate:
Strike forward with a series of punches, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
This skill will not interrupt the combo count for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Leaps into the air with a powerful uppercut, striking enemies in front and dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again during this skill to spend additional Energy to perform a powerful follow-up attack, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to follow up with the 4th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> during the shuffle dodge to activate:
Strike forward with a powerful punch combo, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
This skill will not interrupt the combo count for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance
Chain Attack: V-Form Scorching Sun
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a small area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: W-Form Crowned Inferno
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike in a large area around, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Blazing Flash - Guard
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Swift Break
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Charging Slam - Stab
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

1161004.Name: Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut (Punch Combo)

1161005.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance

1161006.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance (Punch Combo)

Name: Core Passive: Accelerant
Additional Ability: Fighting Spirit
Desc:
Lighter automatically gains <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> over time, at a rate of 2.9 points per second. For each point of Energy consumed by any squad member, Lighter recovers an additional 0.26 <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>, up to a maximum of 100. When <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> reaches 80, the next time Lighter switches into battle he immediately launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>. Once <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is 80 or higher, executing the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> puts Lighter in the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, enhancing the power of the startup light punch, jab combo, and the Finishing Move of the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. When a skill hits an enemy with its power increased, it will continuously consume <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>. With every 10 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> consumed, Lighter's Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>1%</color>, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, and lasting 6s.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, Lighter will no longer automatically gain <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> over time. If his <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is exhausted during a startup light punch or jab combo, he will automatically follow up with a more powerful Finishing Move.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when startup light punches or jab combos hit enemies, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color> are reduced by 15%, lasting 30s.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when the Finishing Move hits an enemy, it applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect on the target, extending its Stunned duration by 3s. The <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect can trigger only once on the same target before they recover from Stun.
When the Finishing Move of the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, when he switches off field, or when his <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> runs out, Lighter will leave the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, keeping any unspent <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when the 5th hit of Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, all squad members gain a stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. For each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, an Agent's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> increase by 1.25%.
When obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, if Lighter's Impact exceeds 170, every additional 10 points of Impact will increase the buff effect provided by each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> by an extra 0.25%. When any squad member launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, it will refresh the duration of all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> can increase the <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> of Agents by a maximum of 75%.

1.Name: The Champion
1.Desc: Among the debuffs imposed by <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Accelerant</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect increases Stun duration by 5s, while further reducing <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color> by 10%. The more powerful Finishing Move that follows when Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is completely exhausted during a startup light punch or jab combo deals 30% increased DMG.
1.Desc2:
Victory for the champion is crucial. By facing off against the strongest fighter from the opposing side, he eliminates the threat to his leader — bringing an immense morale uplift to the team.
For him, only victory deserves recognition.
"The Champion cannot be defeated."

2.Name: Red Scarf
2.Desc: When applying <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> via <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Accelerant</color> to enemies, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 25%. The increase to <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> provided by <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability: Fighting Spirit</color> increases to 120% of the original.
2.Desc2:
As the "Red Scarf" of the Sons of Calydon, Lighter is quite famous in the Outer Ring, and not just because of his fists, but also due to... his unique way of speaking.
"I enjoy taking it easy... but you wouldn't manage without me, would you?"

3.Name: Mercenary Leader
3.Desc2: "I'm probably the last person anyone should pick as their leader."

4.Name: Sunglasses
4.Desc: When Lighter is off-field, the Energy Regen for the on-field character is increased by 10%. Upon entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, Lighter restores 4 Energy for off-field characters. This effect can trigger once every 18s.
4.Desc2: "You're asking why I wear sunglasses? Uh... it's because I get queasy at the sight of blood, I guess."

5.Name: Decision Maker
5.Desc2:
"Give me an order, and I'll carry it out. It's that simple."
Lighter adjusted his sunglasses with a carefree smile.
"Just don't put me in charge of making decisions."

6.Name: Survivor
6.Desc: Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> recovery efficiency is increased to 200% of its original value. When Lighter lands a heavy strike on enemies during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, it will trigger the <color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Impact</color> effect, dealing 250% of ATK as <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. This effect can trigger once every 8s on each enemy. If Lighter's Impact exceeds 170 points, each additional point will further increase the multiplier of <color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Impact</color> by 5%, up to a maximum increase of 500%. The more powerful Finishing Move that follows when Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is completely exhausted during a light punch or jab combo will trigger an additional activation of <color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Impact</color> when hitting an enemy, ignoring the effect's cooldown.
6.Desc2:
If given the chance to do it all over again, he would never opt to be the only survivor.
Unfortunately, fate is rarely a choice.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Kazahana
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 slashes ahead, the first two deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, and the last three deal <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Block enemy attacks during the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Shimotsuki
Description.Desc:
With at least 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Hoshimi Miyabi sheaths her blade, enters <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> and starts to charge up. Every level of charge will consume 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, up to a maximum of three levels of charge.
When releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal>, or when <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, Hoshimi Miyabi will draw her blade and unleash a powerful slash ahead based on the current charge level, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>. She then exits <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Character is invulnerable during <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Hoshimi Miyabi can have up to 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.

Param.Name: Charge Level One Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level Two Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level Three Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level One Slash Daze Multiplier
Charge Level Two Slash Daze Multiplier
Charge Level Three Slash Daze Multiplier

Description.Name: Dodge: Mizutori
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
While dodging, repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A dash dodge that covers a lot of ground.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Fuyubachi
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Kan Suzume
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Miyuki
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly draws her blade and slashes ahead, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Hisetsu
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Rush forward, unleashing powerful slashes against enemies along the way, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, with enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again to activate:
Consume extra Energy and unleash a powerful follow-up attack against enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Spring's Call
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Lingering Snow
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area then pauses, before unleashing a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and increase <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> by 30% for 12s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Dancing Petals
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Drifting Petals
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Falling Petals
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charges and slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1091003.Name: Basic Attack: Shimotsuki
1091003.Desc: <IconMap:Icon_Normal> (Hold) (With at least 2 points of Fallen Frost)

Name: Core Passive: Searing Cold
Additional Ability: Bask in Frost
Desc:
When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>, she applies <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to the target, lasting 30s. When accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color> against targets with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, increases <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> by 100% of Hoshimi Miyabi's CRIT Rate, up to a maximum increase of 80%. As Hoshimi Miyabi accumulates <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color>, it has its own independent Attribute Anomaly Buildup gauge and triggers <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color>, <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>, and <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> that can react with other Attribute Anomalies, including <color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute Anomaly</color>, to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>.
When Hoshimi Miyabi applies <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> to enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, it will consume the <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>750%</color> of Hoshimi Miyabi's ATK and causing the target to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state. All squad members accumulate <color=#2BAD00>14%</color> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to these enemies. The <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state ends when <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> and remove <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>.
Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG increases by 60%. When any squad member triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> during the next <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> will ignore 30% of the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color>.

Additional Ability: Bask in Frost

When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>, she applies <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to the target, lasting 30s. 1.Name: Frost Atop the Snow
1.Desc: While in <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, every 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> consumed will allow <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> to ignore 6% of DEF, stacking up to 6 times and lasting until <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> ends. When the slash for charge level three of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> hits an enemy under <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>, it will immediately remove the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state and increase all squad members' Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20% for 10s.

2.Name: Breath Technique
2.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 30%. Hoshimi Miyabi gains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> when the final move of the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> hits an enemy. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and her CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

4.Name: Rupture
4.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color> DMG increases by 30%. Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi generates 250 more Decibels.

6.Name: Prodigious Talent
6.Desc: During <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, which increases <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG by 30%. After obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi will automatically draw her blade and unleash powerful slashes based on the current charge level upon consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Before <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, the draw and slashes will not interrupt charging under <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>. Each occurrence of <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> can perform up to 3 draws and slashes.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to five piercing attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the 5th hit of the Basic Attack hits an enemy, it generates 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
After activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the next time Harumasa activates the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color> and hits an enemy with it, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer - Drift
Description.Desc:
During <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Shoot a ranged piercing attack and reposition towards the corresponding drag direction, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Falling Feather
Description.Desc:
After the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>, a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, or a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Immediately shoot <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to aim at a target and release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
After drawing the bowstring and aiming, shoot <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> at the target, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Ha-Oto no Ya
Description.Desc:
When the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> hits an enemy or the ground, it can generate 2/6/6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>. If there are no <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> on the field when any squad member applies an Attribute Anomaly to an enemy, generate 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
There can be up to 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> present at a time. If there are any <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> present when Harumasa fires and hits enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> will activate and fire <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> at the enemies hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color>, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> will apply <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to enemies hit, stacking up to 8 times and lasting 10s, repeated triggers reset the duration. While a target has at least 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>, they will be <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Quick Flash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launch multiple piercing attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Hidden Edge
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Pierces enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash
Description.Desc:
While there are <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemies on the field, Harumasa will enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, switching <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru</color> for <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>.

While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rush forwards to the closest <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemy and execute a powerful slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the slash hits the target, it consumes 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>. With less than 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> will be removed from the enemy. Before <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> is removed, repeatedly press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to repeatedly use <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>. While no <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemies exist on the field, Harumasa leaves the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Feather</color>to quickly follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash
Special Attack: Nowhere to Hide
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Launch an arrow forward, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Launch daggers and an enhanced arrow ahead, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the enhanced arrow hits an enemy or the ground, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run
Chain Attack: Kai - Hanare
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead then fire an enhanced arrow, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the arrow hits the ground, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Zanshin
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Braced Bow
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Yugamae
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Yugamae - Slash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1201001.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer (1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit)

1201002.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer (4th and 5th hit)

1201006.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run

1201008.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash

1201009.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash (Quick launch)

Additional Ability: Overclock

Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color> increases the CRIT DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> by <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>.

1.Name: "High Spirit"
1.Desc: The maximum stack limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Ha-Oto no Ya</color> increases to 14 stacks. When an <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quiver</color> is triggered, 2 consecutive <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> will be fired at the target.

2.Name: Languish
2.Desc: When using an <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Harumasa gains 7 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color>, up to a max of 7 stacks. While possessing <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color>, the DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> increases by 50%. Consume 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color> once <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> ends.

4.Name: Occasionally Motivated
4.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> now lasts for 20s. When <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> hits enemies, Harumasa gains 30 Decibels once per use of this skill. Upon activating <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, apply maximum stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to all on-field enemies.

6.Name: Tacit Understanding
6.Desc: After <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> hits Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomalies, Harumasa will ignore 15% of the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color> for 12s. Every 12 times an enemy is hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color>, trigger an extra electromagnetic explosion, dealing 1,500% of Harumasa's ATK to the target as <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Astra just sent me another message on Knock Knock! It's a swimsuit photoshoot for "Jealous"! Wow, she's got a great body~
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: What?! Why don't I... Ahem, I think my phone is broken. Belle, can I borrow yours for a moment?
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
There's no record of Astra Yao's aptitude for Ether in her New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile.
Note: She has an outstanding aptitude for Ether.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Astra Yao is widely regarded as Ridu's most iconic singer. With her extraordinary voice, stage presence, and songwriting talent, she has led the musical trends of an entire era. "If music is the resonance of the soul, then Astra Yao is the spark that ignites it all," said one famous music critic.

As brilliant as she is, Astra remains remarkably sincere and pure. On stage, her voice resonates deeply with the audience, which has allowed her to amass a large and loyal fanbase known as her "Astranauts." Of course, Astra's brilliance wouldn't be possible without the careful protection of her manager, Evelyn. Offstage, she appears to be just a cute, hapless girl who depends on Evelyn in her daily life, and on Wise and Belle in the Hollows.

"If I tickled Eous, would it make you laugh?" Astra asked curiously while lifting the Proxy, who was linked via the HDD system.

She seems to have a particular fondness for Eous.
Contemplation: Human emotions are indeed an interesting subject. It's still hard to determine whether Astra likes Eous because of the owner, or whether she likes the owner because of Eous.
UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Goldfinch's Escape" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 5)

TrustLv.1:
Astra Yao is widely regarded as Ridu's most iconic singer. With her extraordinary voice, stage presence, and songwriting talent, she has led the musical trends of an entire era. "If music is the resonance of the soul, then Astra Yao is the spark that ignites it all," said one famous music critic.

As brilliant as she is, Astra remains remarkably sincere and pure. On stage, her voice resonates deeply with the audience, which has allowed her to amass a large and loyal fanbase known as her "Astranauts." Of course, Astra's brilliance wouldn't be possible without the careful protection of her manager, Evelyn. Offstage, she appears to be just a cute, hapless girl who depends on Evelyn in her daily life, and on Wise and Belle in the Hollows.

"If I tickled Eous, would it make you laugh?" Astra asked curiously while lifting the Proxy, who was linked via the HDD system.

She seems to have a particular fondness for Eous.
Contemplation: Human emotions are indeed an interesting subject. It's still hard to determine whether Astra likes Eous because of the owner, or whether she likes the owner because of Eous.
TrustLv.3:
Astra is particularly fond of Random Play. However, her whereabouts are closely monitored. For now, it seems she can still use an excuse like, "The store offers rare versions of old movies, and I've got such good taste in movies, so of course I'd love it!" But being the biggest celebrity in Ridu, such frequent visits to a video rental store are not exactly conducive to keeping our identity under wraps.

But, who cares about that! If our identity gets exposed, so be it — Astra can't not come.
Contemplation: Creating various situations to bring Astra and Master together is a great way to win the Master's favor.

3113110.Name: Astra Yao: Scarlet Rock
3113110.Desc: The bold red is only to ignite the freedom deep within. On stage, nothing can overshadow her brilliance.

3113111.Name: Astra Yao: Chandelier
3113111.Desc: The black-and-white dress glimmers in both light and shadows. Every smile of hers seems to sink into the flowing light of the night, becoming a timeless classic.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: "Capriccio"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform up to three attacks forward, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
During the 3rd-hit, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to charge, drawing enemies in and expanding the attack range for a stronger attack.
After using other skills, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to initiate the 3rd-hit directly.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Interlude
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> forward to attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Chorus
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Launch multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> attacks at enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Finale
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> forward to attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> and exit the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.
Upon activation of the skill, it grants the buff from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"</color>.
With enough Energy, consumes Energy to follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>. This <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> attack released is considered an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: "Mini Waltz"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: "Lunar Eclipse Melody"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Attack ahead, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
When triggered, dragging the{LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} allows movement in the corresponding direction.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: "Umbrella Waltz"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Attack enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: "Windchimes & Oaths"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly move away, then release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color>, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, and enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.
During activation, dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} enables movement in the direction held.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to charge during activation, drawing enemies in, and follow up with 1 to 4 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolos</color> depending on the charge duration.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable when quickly moving away.

Description.Name: Idyllic Cadenza
Description.Desc:
After entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, Astra Yao increases all squad members' DMG by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:0.08+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.01,100,2}%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:0.07+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.015,100,2}%</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, Astra Yao cannot move, but pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> will activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Interlude</color>, and pressing <IconMap:Icon_Evade> will activate a dodge. After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Chorus</color>.
While in this state, Astra Yao's Anti-Interrupt Level is increased, and the DMG she takes is reduced by 40%. After switching to another character, Astra Yao will remain on the field and become Invulnerable. When switching back to her, she will automatically follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: "Windchimes & Oaths"</color>.
During this state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, exiting the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, or hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to exit the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state directly.

Description.Name: Chord
Description.Desc:
For every 25 Energy, Astra Yao will have 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Chord</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when Astra Yao has <color=#FFFFFF>Chords</color>, a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> can be triggered in the following situations:
· When the active character's attack hits an enemy, once per 3s.
· When the active character's heavy attack hits an enemy, once per 1s.
When other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, Astra Yao will consume 25 Energy and release 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack. This <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> attack released is considered an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>.
After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, quickly press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to switch characters and trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color>, causing Astra Yao to follow up with 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color> to attack. When other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, it will automatically trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: "Tipsy Concerto"
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Use song to channel energy into a blast, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After the skill, Astra Yao enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.

Description.Name: Ultimate: "Fantasian Sonata"
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Use song to channel energy into a blast, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, and restoring <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:-50+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*250,1,2}</color> HP to all squad members.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After the skill, Astra Yao enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.
After the skill, the next two <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assists</color> will be replaced by <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: "One Luminous Sky"
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Attack enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: "Two Hearts"
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: "Three Lifetimes of Fate"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Release an energy beam forward, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>22%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

1.Name: 12-Tone Equal Temperament
1.Desc: When Astra Yao's attack hits an enemy, the target's All-Attribute RES is reduced by 6%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Upon entering the battlefield, Astra Yao immediately gains 1,000 Decibels. When activating her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, all squad members gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Song of Protection</color> for 60s. When attacked by an enemy, consume <color=#FFFFFF>Song of Protection</color>, granting Invulnerability for 1s.
1.Desc2:
"What is the 12-tone equal temperament?"
"12-tone equal temperament is a musical tuning system, just like how children have to line up, sounds need to be in order too."
"But sounds probably don't like lining up, just like children!"
—Astra Yao's music teacher, recalling when she was six.

2.Name: Art of Greed
2.Desc: The ATK buff from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"</color> is further increased by 19%, with an increased maximum of 400. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color> to attack. This effect can trigger once every 3s.
2.Desc2:
"The shiniest thing in the world is, of course, love!"
Just like a bird gathering shiny things for its nest, an artist's inner greed is probably to gather all the love in the world. By gathering all the love, one can create the most beautiful melody.

3.Name: Interwoven Staff Notation
3.Desc2:
A blank musical staff is a set of parallel lines that never intersect, like souls that have never met, quietly waiting for their melodies to intertwine into a song.
"Let's fill it with notes! And lots and lots of tied notes. It'll make a fantastic song!"
And that's how a new song was created, stretching across 136 bars, all connected with ties...

4.Name: "Hair Upon Your Nape"
4.Desc: After activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, within 15s, Astra Yao can trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> even if she does not have <color=#FFFFFF>Chords</color>. When the attack hits an enemy, the interval for triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is reduced to 1s. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members enter the field via a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, they will receive different buffs based on their specialty, and this effect can be triggered once every 3s for the entire squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color>: The next <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> heavy attack on an enemy will deal extra DMG equal to 300% of Astra Yao's ATK; <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color>: The next <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will have 50% increased Anomaly Buildup; <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color>: The next <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will inflict 50% increased Daze.
4.Desc2:
One hand hovers over the piano
Not sure which note will bring me peace
A sad minor key
Or gentle melody of longing?
I seek your shadow through the score
I close my eyes, and see you more
Such as the hair upon your nape

5.Name: Proxy and Silk String
5.Desc2:
"Eve! I've just realized something huge — both you and {M#Wise}{F#Belle} are tall and slim!"
"...And your point being...?"
"You're both my favorite people!"
Astra beamed with joy, as if she had uncovered an earth-shattering secret.

6.Name: We Are the World
6.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, the DMG multiplier for <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color> released or followed up with will increase to 200% of the original, and CRIT Rate is increased by 80%. When triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color>, Astra Yao will automatically follow up with the charged 3rd-hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: "Capriccio"</color>, with a 80% increased CRIT Rate. This effect can trigger once every 10s.
6.Desc2:
The turmoil in the world originates from the solitude of the human heart. If everyone's heart was reciprocated, perhaps all the suffering, sadness, and silence in the world would vanish?
If we could weave this connection with song, would all the cracks heal, and all the pain turn into a beautiful melody, filling the silence? At that point, the world would no longer be a lonely island.
"This song is dedicated to the world!"

PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Evelyn is so cool! Can't she debut as a celebrity with Astra? I'd love to see them do a photo shoot together!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: I really envy you. You can say that so easily, but if I said it, I'd probably get hit...
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
Hollow Investigative Association Licensing Archive:
Evelyn Chevalier, possessing a good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Evelyn is the manager and personal bodyguard of Ridu's most iconic singer, Astra Yao. Known for her calm, decisive decision-making and professional, efficient style, she's an irreplaceable pillar behind Astra. "In terms of commercial value, if Astra Yao represents the 1, then Evelyn is all the 0s that follow," a reporter from an entertainment magazine stated.

Evelyn is skilled at planning comprehensive schedules and product endorsements, while also ensuring Astra Yao's safety during any unexpected situations. "Want to get close to Astra Yao? You'll have to get past Evelyn Chevalier first..." Though she's always busy with work, Evelyn never seems overwhelmed, and she has an almost obsessive attention to detail, ensuring that every performance and every product endorsement goes through her strict scrutiny. But strangely, such an exceptional manager is not trusted by her parent company, Odeum HAE.

Intel: Evelyn's role seems to go beyond just being a manager and personal bodyguard; there seems to be an "organization" behind her.

It seems a lot of people in Astra Yao's central Astranauts group ship them together.
UnlockCondition: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Goldfinch's Escape" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 5)

TrustLv.3:
Information about the "organization" Evelyn is affiliated with is scarce. Currently, it is only known that she was brought into the "organization" at a young age, where she underwent harsh training and developed skills to make quick decisions and carry out tasks in any environment. While these experiences have left numerous hidden scars on her, they also gave her remarkable abilities and composure.

Consideration: We need to look into what kind of "organization" it actually is.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Razor Wire
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to five attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the 5th hit lands against an enemy, Evelyn will use her <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.

Description.Name: Passive: Bind
Description.Desc:
When Evelyn uses her skills to deal DMG to enemies, she will accumulate <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color>.
When Evelyn consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Garrote</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Decibels</color> to perform an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.
Once Evelyn has 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Points</color>, her next use of <color=#FFFFFF>Garrote</color> will consume all <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Points</color> to instead use a lower Interrupt Level version of <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> is at 50% or higher, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Consume 50% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> to use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to perform a slashing attack, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Garrote - Second Form
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> is 50% or higher, after using <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form</color>, continue to hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Consume 50% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> to use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to perform a follow-up attack, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Arc Step
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Piercing Ambush
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Deliver a kick to the enemy in front, causing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Strangling Reversal
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to slash surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>;
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Locked Position
Description.Desc:
Before entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to pull the enemy and charge forward with a kick, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the attack hits the enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form
Description.Desc:
After entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Centered on the target affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, tether surrounding enemies and detonate an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> will end after detonation.
Dodge enemy attacks upon activating the skill, and if a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, gain an additional 25% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color>.
After tethering surrounding enemies, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to cancel detonation and immediately follow up with the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack's</color> 3rd hit.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form
Description.Desc:
After entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> and with enough Energy, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Centered on the target affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, tether surrounding enemies and detonate an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> will end after detonation.
Dodge enemy attacks upon activating the skill, and if a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, gain an additional 25% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color>.
After pulling in surrounding enemies, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to cancel detonation and immediately follow up with the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack's</color> 3rd hit.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form
EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form
Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrotes</color> and detonates an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in the area.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Lunalux Garrote - Timbre
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrotes</color> and detonates an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in the area.
Upon activating this skill, Evelyn removes her jacket and enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Dance of Awakened Fire</color> state, which lasts for the entire battle. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Dance of Awakened Fire</color> state, when Evelyn consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Points</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare</color>, she will retain 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>. When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target, entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Lunalux Garrote - Shadow
Description.Desc:
While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Dance of Awakened Fire</color> state, and when Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrotes</color> and detonates an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in the area.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Fierce Blade
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to slash surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Silent Protection
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Course Disruption
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Evelyn slashes with <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color>, then triggers an explosion ahead, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

If Evelyn switches to another character while in <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, she will automatically follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form</color>.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character:
Evelyn's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by 30%. When Evelyn's CRIT Rate is at or over 80%, the DMG multiplier for her <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases to 125% of the original value.

If Evelyn switches to another character while in <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, she will automatically follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form</color>.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character:
Evelyn's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by 30%. When Evelyn's CRIT Rate is at or over 80%, the DMG multiplier for her <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases to 125% of the original value.

1.Name: Dreamweave
1.Desc: Upon entering the battlefield, Evelyn immediately gains 1,500 Decibels. Enemies affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> will be <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color>. When Evelyn attacks <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color> enemies, she ignores 12% of their DEF. When Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color> effect spreads to all enemies hit by the skill. This spread <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color> effect lasts for 10s.
1.Desc2:
The distant, blurred light seemed to be a dream she had crafted, an unreachable future. It wasn't about atonement, but a yearning for freedom.
"You want it too, don't you? A real life." An anonymous former coworker once asked Evelyn.

2.Name: Dance of Fire
2.Desc: Evelyn's ATK increases by 15%. When Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - Second Form</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> consumed will be returned. This effect can trigger once every 25s. When Evelyn consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare</color>, the skill's Interrupt Level increases.
2.Desc2:
"To me, that light was unfamiliar, something I should have steered clear of, but it broke through every barrier, as though it was trying to remind me that beyond the darkness, there was something worth chasing."
When Evelyn recalls the first time she met Astra Yao, there's a rare softness in her tone.

3.Name: Metamorphosis
3.Desc2: At that moment, she frees herself from her restraints and becomes her truest self. The tightened ropes snap, and the chains turn into a broken cocoon. Evelyn stands at the boundary of rebirth, and in her cold, sharp gaze, there is the flicker of a faint, soft glow.

4.Name: Fate's Melody
4.Desc: Upon activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Evelyn immediately gains a shield equal to 10% of her Max HP. While this shield exists, Evelyn's CRIT DMG increases by 40%.
4.Desc2:
"You know, Eve? Every time I meet someone important to me, my heart goes 'thump-thump!'"
Evelyn sighs, signaling that it was getting late. Astra quickly fastens the back of her gown and rushed out the door.
"Thump thump," Evelyn mutters to herself, left alone in the dressing room.

5.Name: Crimson Threads Like the Dawn
5.Desc2:
Her threads, dyed crimson like the clouds at dawn.
After each attack, she spins elegantly, blazing flames scattering like the morning light. No words are needed — Evelyn's protection has turned into a radiant flame.

6.Name: Bond of Light and Shadow
6.Desc: Upon launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Evelyn gains <color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</color> for 20s. During <color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</color>, when Evelyn hits her primary target with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she additionally executes a <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> follow-up attack, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to 375% of her ATK to enemies in the area. This DMG is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> DMG and can trigger up to 16 times. Gaining another <color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</color> will refresh the trigger count.
6.Desc2:
Where there is light, there will always be shadow.
It silently hides, tracing the light's path, guarding each bright burst. The shadow never tries to steal the light's brilliance, but at every turn, it quietly fills those corners the light cannot reach. The two have never been separated, nor can they be — light is whole because of shadow, and shadow exists because of light. It's an eternal pursuit, an unspeakable connection.
